column1: 1604_london_treaty_desc;After the death of Queen Elizabeth in 1603
column2: her successor James I
column3: quickly sought to end the long and draining conflict. James was an idealistic practitioner of Christian peace and unity
column4: and also the son and successor to Mary
column5: Queen of Scots
column6: whose execution had been a proximate cause of the conflict. Philip III of Spain
column7: who also had inherited the war from his predecessor
column8: Philip II
column9: and whose treasuries had also been drained
column10: warmly welcomed the offer and ordered the commencement of the difficult negotiations that followed.;;;;;;x;;

column1: abandon_beiyang_faction_desc;The goals of the Beiyang Army are no longer our own. As our ideology has changed
column2: so must our allegiance. The civil war continues!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: abandon_communist_faction_desc;The goals of the Communists are no longer our own. As our ideology has changed
column2: so must our allegiance. The civil war continues!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: abandon_kuomintang_faction_desc;The goals of the Kuomintang are no longer our own. As our ideology has changed
column2: so must our allegiance. The civil war continues!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: abandon_neutral_faction_desc;We can no longer afford to stand on the sidelines in the civil war. For better or worse
column2: we must recognize that we have already cast the die in the conflict and take a stand.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: abandon_neutrality_desc;The might of the Swiss army is such that we can repel our neighbors without difficulty. Our policy of neutrality is no longer necessary.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: under which the daimyo rule as feudal lords with very little central authority remaining to the government
column3: is an antiquated relic that must be eliminated. The domains shall be replaced with prefectures
column4: and the daimyos given roles as governors and bureaucrats. There will be resistance
column5: but all will come to understand that this is for the greater good of Japan.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the most prertigious center of study for the italian language
column3: would gladly appreciate an economic help from your majesty to keep on with the good work on italian literature's history... and to pay those new paintings for the main hall;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: act_of_union_desc;This act would finalise the joining England ans Scotland together and form a new United Kingdom of Great Britain;;;;;;x;;
aden_protectorate_desc;With enough influence among the sheiks of southern Yemen
column2: a treaty could be signed that would force them to acknowledge us as their sovereign. We cede them Aden
column3: and in return they would agree enter into no relationships with other nations without our express permission. Our continued influence over the Arabian peninsula would be secured.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: address_desc;The nation has been addressed by our leaders. The effects of that address will no doubt be felt for years to come.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: although the direct implications are obvious
column3: whether or not it will go down in history shall remain to be seen.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: albania_in_yugoslavia_desc;The Albanians must be incorporated into the larger Slavic union.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
allamerica_desc;Since we ware seen as a Great Power we should rule over North America
column2: instad of the European colonial Powers.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: anarcho_liberal_stronghold_desc;This region is considered a stronghold of anarcho-liberal support within the country.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
anglo_japanese_alliance_desc;With mutual enemies among the Great Powers
column2: perhaps it is best if the British Empire and our nation work together.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: annex_easter_island_desc;The native population of Easter Island has suffered many devastations in recent years
column2: from attacks by Peruvian pirates to a tuberculosis epidemic. A colonist has operated a sheep ranch there for some years
column3: and recently offered to sell to our government. Considering his ranch covers a large portion of the island
column4: we would be well within our rights to claim sovereignty over it.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: annex_fiji_desc;With Australian settlers having puchased land on the island of Fiji
column2: they have slowly become insinuated within the court of King Cakobau. So it is that recently
column3: when the king's lavish overspending saddled his kingdom with considerable debt
column4: the settlers offered to negotiate terms by which the British government would pay off the debt and annex the island as a new colony.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: its former ally;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: annex_hawaii_desc;Our relationship with the Hawaiian government has borne fruit. They have asked to become a part of our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
annex_korea_desc;Preserving the independence of Korea is too costly. If the 'line of advantage' is to be maintained
column2: we must push our borders well beyond their current sphere. Korea must be turned into a protectorate of the Empire
column3: for its own good as well as ours.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: annex_lan_na_desc;The Kingdom of Lan Na must unite with Siam
column2: for the benefit of both our nations in resisting imperialist control.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;

column1: annex_mayotte_desc;The ruler of the small island of Maore
column2: which French traders have dubbed 'Mayotte'
column3: is a primitive sultan who only broke away from Malagasy rule in recent years. He has petitioned the French government for status as a protectorate
column4: clearly preferring civilized rule to those of his neighbors.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: annex_new_caledonia_desc;There is some interest within the French government of creating a penal colony-- somewhere that enemies of the monarchy could be sent
column2: allowing them to be far away from the continent where they can do no harm. Admiral Febvrier Despointes reports that the island of New Caledonia
column3: off the coast of Australia
column4: might do just the trick. Considering the British have used Australia for the same purpose
column5: who could object to us doing similarly?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the duchy was occupied by French troops under Napoleon Bonaparte
column3: and the political situation of the State became extremely confused. Duke Ferdinand maintained his throne under French military governors until the Treaty of Aranjuez of 1801
column4: when a general agreement between the House of Bourbon and Napoleon formally decided the cession of the duchy to France in exchange for Tuscany
column5: but the Duke lasted in Parma until he died in 1802
column6: maybe by poisoning. However
column7: Napoleon was undecided about the future of the duchy
column8: aspiring to a total engagement of the Bourbons in the European wars as his allies. Even if French laws and administration was gradually introduced
column9: the formal annexation to the French Empire was declared only in 1808 after the outbreak of the conflict against Bourbonic Spain. The duchy was reformed as the département of Taro.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: annex_piedmont_desc;Piedmont was the main part of the Kingdom of Sardinia which
column2: despite its name
column3: had its core on the mainland. The kingdom suffered a first French invasion in 1796
column4: which led to the Treaty of Paris and the loss of Savoy and Nice. After a second invasion in 1798
column5: King Charles Emmanuel IV escaped to Rome
column6: but he never agreed to sign a new peace treaty
column7: approving a final arrangement of its continental territories according to international law. After the great Battle of Marengo in 1800
column8: Piedmont was still under military occupation when on 4 June 1802
column9: Charles Emmanuel abdicated in favor of his brother Victor Emmanuel I
column10: who was in Cagliari under British naval protection. Napoleon took this pretext to declare the forfeiture of the old sovereignty over Piedmont
column11: which was annexed to France in September 1802 as the départements of Doire
column18: whereas Novara (as the department of Agogna) went to Republican Italy.;;;;;;;;;;;X

column1: annex_wallis_desc;In 1810 Napoleon declared this ephemeral state a part of the French empire under the name of Department of the Simplon. In 1810 the Rhodanic Republic was annexed by Napoleonic France as the department of Simplon.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
ansei_purge_desc;After the recent succession crisis of the shogunate
column2: there are too many opposing factions within the bakufu. We must take steps to ensure these men are retired
column3: forcefully or otherwise
column4: lest they continue to stir up problems in the name of the Emperor.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: anti_manchu_sentiment_desc;There is a great deal of bitterness against the Qing Dynasty's rulers in this province.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
appeal_to_the_british_desc;Though we are loathe to do so
column2: it appears we are left with little choice: we must appeal to the British for protection
column3: lest we fall under foreign rule and lose what little we have left.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: apply_for_USA_statehood2_title;Apply for Statehood;Demande de rattachement en tant qu'État;Antrag auf Souveränität;;Solicitud de ingreso como estado;;;;;;;;;x
apply_for_USA_statehood2_desc;Our position on the North American continent
column2: and our traditional cultural ties to the USA
column3: make it likely that the USA would accept a petition of statehood from us. Doing this means our country will be annexed by the United States;Notre position géographique sur le continent nord Américain
column4: et les liens qui nous unissent aux Etats-Unis font que ces derniers accepteraient probablement une pétition sur une demande de rattachement en tant qu'Etat. En faisant cela
column5: notre pays serait annexé aux Etats-Unis.;Unsere Position auf dem nordamerikanischen Kontinent und unsere traditionellen kulturellen Verbindungen mit den USA machen es wahrscheinlich
column6: dass die USA einen Antrag auf Souveränität von uns akzeptiert. Dies bedeutet
column7: dass unser Land von den Vereinigten Staaten annektiert wird;;Por nuestra posición en el continente norteamericano y nuestros vínculos culturales tradicionales con los EE.UU. parece probable que nos acepten como estado de la Unión si lo solicitamos. Si lo hacemos
column8: nuestro país será anexionado por los Estados Unidos.;;;;;;;;;x

column2: we seek to become part of the United States of Central America.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: appoint_von_bismarck_desc;Our naton needs a great statesman as its Chancellor
column2: and we have just the man. Otto von Bismarck is currently the country's First Minister
column3: but appointed as the leader of our nation he could see it transformed on the world stage.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: argentina_chile_border_treaty_desc;Now that the lands of Araucania and Patagonia are fully settled
column2: it might be prudent for us to approach the Chileans and see if we cannot agree on a border-- they would get the lands west of the Andes and we the lands to the east. If we cannot come to an agreement
column3: there is likely to be war.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: austria_annex_SGF_desc;With the great empire of the Habsburgs now lost to us
column2: perhaps it is time to look north towards the unification of Germany. First
column3: however
column4: we must bring the South German Confederation under our own leadership.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: austrian_form_south_german_confederation_desc;With our dominant position over the south German states
column2: we can create the South German Confederation-- a union that would be under our full control
column3: and a more useful ally than the nations separately.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: austrian_form_south_german_confederation2_desc;While Germany was not united until the proclamation of the German Empire
column2: following the Franco-Prussian war
column3: rising nationalism in the 19th century had meant that unification had been on the cards long before that
column4: with the Frankfurt assembly of 1848 being an important forerunner. By achieving a dominant position among the South German states
column5: we can form the South German Confederation.;Il fallut attendre la proclamation de l'Empire allemand qui suivit la guerre franco-allemande pour assister à l'unification de l'Allemagne. Pourtant
column6: avec la montée du nationalisme au XIXe siècle
column7: l'unification aurait été possible bien avant cela
column8: comme en témoigne l'assemblée de Francfort de 1848. En nous imposant dans les États du sud
column9: nous formerons les États du sud de l'Allemagne.;Obwohl Deutschland bis zur Proklamation des Deutschen Kaiserreichs nach dem deutsch-französischen Krieg nicht geeint war
column10: bedeutete der steigende Nationalismus des neunzehnten Jahrhunderts
column11: dass eine Vereinigung schon seit langer Zeit geplant war. Ein wichtiges vorbereitendes Ereignis war die Frankfurter Nationalversammlung von 1848. Wenn wir uns eine dominierende Position unter den norddeutschen Staaten erarbeiten
column12: können wir den Süddeutschen Bund gründen.;;Aunque Alemania no estuvo unida hasta la proclamación del Imperio Alemán
column14: el nacionalismo emergente del siglo XIX puso de relieve que la unificación era inevitable. La asamblea de Frankfurt de 1848 supuso un importante precedente. Al alcanzar una posición dominante entre los estados germanos meridionales
column15: podemos formar la Confederación de Alemania del Sur.;;;;;;;;;x;;

column1: Balkanoverview_DESC;The Balkans have been a hot spot for centuries. Nationalism is on the rise. People want independence. At the 1878 Congress of Berlin
column2: leaders of countries across Europe met to decide the fate of the Balkans. As a result of this congress
column3: Bulgaria was established as a sattelite of the Ottomans
column4: but lost some of its previous territory. Romania was given full independence. Serbia and Montenegro were also
column5: but their territory was reduced. Austria took over Bosnia and Herzegovina. So
column6: many pieces of land had claims by multuple countries. Also
column7: the Ottoman Empire got land that was formerly owned by Bulgaria
column8: so they wanted their land back. In the first balkan war
column9: the Balkan countries took almost all of the rest of Turkey's land in Europe. Bulgaria was upset over division of spoils though
column10: which led to the Second Balkan War. In this war Bulgaria attacked Serbia and Greece
column11: and Romania attacked Bulgaria. Bulgaria was defeated. All countries were still upset at the end of this war
column12: so another war could draw the intervention of the Great Powers.;x;x;;x;;;;;;;;;x

column1: Balkanproblems_desc;The citizens of our Balkan nation are mad;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x
balkan_problems;Problems in the Balkans;République populaire d'Amérique;American People's Republic;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x
balkan_problems_desc;There have long been problems in the Balkans and people are starting to revolt;États confédérés d'Amérique;CSA;;EE CC;;;;;;;;;x
banda_oriental_desc;The Banda Oriental del Uruguay was argentinean once
column2: and shall be argentinean again!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_a_freestate_desc;Without the emperor on our back
column2: we should become a democracy.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_austria_desc;The time has come to end the dual monarchy and return to our Austrian heritage.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_belgium_FLA_desc;The Flemish and the Wallonians may re-unite under a single flag. Long live Belgium!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_belgium_WLL_desc;The Flemish and the Wallonians may re-unite under a single flag. Long live Belgium!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_danube_federation_desc;Now that the Hungarians and all the Danubian cultures have been consulted
column2: the time has come for the new government to be implemented. Long live the Danubian Federation!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
it is time for the Flemish to rule once again.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_hausaland_desc;The hausa have come to increasingly dominate the Caliphate and its court
column2: and it is time Sokoto reflected that fact.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_holstein_desc;With the loss of our lands
column2: we must face a bitter truth and realize that claiming we are more than Holstein is a conceit we cannot afford. Let the truth become reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the Austro-Hungarian government must flee to Budapest instead. The Hungarians will not
column3: however
column4: continue with the arrangement of the Dual Monarchy-- not when what is left of Austria has been lost. The Hungarians will instead become the new power in our union
column5: taking over what remains of our Empire and ruling in our name.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_japan_desc;With the embracing of Western ideas and authority slowly falling away from the shogunate
column2: the government will naturally pass first to the imperial court-- and eventually
column3: with the extension of voting privileges to the landowners
column4: to the Japanese people themselves. This is a natural process
column5: and one the Tokugawa must embrace for the good of Japan.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_kyrgyzstan_desc;We must unite the Kyrgyz into a single and modern state
column2: with sovereignty over all our ancestral land. Under Kyrgyz leadership
column3: all of Turkestan will one day be united!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: we may assume leadership over the Beiyang government and gain international recognition as the true rulers of China.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
we may assume leadership over the government and gain international recognition as the true rulers of China.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_leader_of_kuomintang_desc;It falls to us to take the mantle of Kuomintang leadership. Victory for Nationalist China!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
become_mali_empire_desc;The Mali Empire was once one of the greatest kingdoms in all of Africa. Under the ancient flag we can unite the peoples of the western Sahel
column2: and challenge the might even of the Europeans!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_piedmont_desc;Sardinia and Piedmont must be united into a single land once more!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: we should claim the territory
column3: thats rightfully ours.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_poland_lithuania_desc;Our ancient empire has been reborn. Let Poland-Lithuania exist once again
column2: and let our ancient enemies tremble!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_saudi_arabia_desc;We must reunite Nejd and Hedjaz under a single flag!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: we can no longer claim a name that belongs to a union of Sardinia and Piedmont. We must become the Duchy of Savoy once more.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_toucouleur_desc;The Jihad must continue! With the cities of the central deserts under our control
column2: now is the time to found a united empire that will resist the coming onslaught of the colonial powers!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_uzbekistan_bukkhara_desc;We must unite the Uzbeks into a single state
column2: with sovereignty over all our ancestral land. Under Uzbek leadership
column3: all of Turkestan will one day be united!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_uzbekistan_khiva_desc;We must unite the Uzbeks into a single state
column2: with sovereignty over all our ancestral land. Under Uzbek leadership
column3: all of Turkestan will one day be united!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: it is time for the Wallonian flag to fly once more.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: become_yemen_desc;Northern and Southern Yemen must be united under a single flag-- ours.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
begin_disunited_states_desc;With the transition of the United States away from democracy
column2: the Sons of Liberty have arisen in an effort fight what they call tyranny. It will take time for this resistance to calm
column3: and until it does there shall be much talk of secession and even open revolt.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: begin_hungarian_revolution_desc;We must strike a blow against the Hapsburg monarchy
column2: in the name of Hungarian independence!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
or the 'line of advantage'
column3: means that we must extend Japanese influence beyond our national borders in order to ensure our security. This means turning all of the Japanese military
column4: and indeed our people
column5: to the notion of foreign conquest and glory.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: begin_revolution_desc;Our country is a fledgling state
column2: founded in the midst of chaos and rebellion. But the people are willing to fight!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: begin_zemene_mesafint_desc;With the 'Age of Princes' upon us
column2: we must gather all our forces to unite Ethiopia once again.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: belize_purchase_desc;We are interested in purchasing Belize from Great Britain and integrating it into the United States of Central America. As such
column2: we have have sent delegates overseas to London and are currently awaiting a reply.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: Blanknote_Event;A Blank Note of Support?;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x
Blanknote_DESC;Shall we give our waning southern allies support against any foe? Shall we give them in essence
column2: a blank check?;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x

column1: Blanknote_1;We shall support them completely;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x
Blanknote_2;We shall only support them if attacked;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x
Blanknote_3;We must abandon our allies for the greater good;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x
Blanknotesend_DESC;Shall we ask Germany for a "blank check"
column2: saying that we have their full support?;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x
our enemies are strong and numerous;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x

column1: Blanknotesend_2;We dont need their help;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x
boer_republic_desc;We have established a new nation
column2: dominated by the Voortrekkers and carved from the territory of African natives. This is a new opportunity for us to live outside of British rule
column3: now and forever.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: and our modern administration will get rid of Gaijin names and change them accordingly.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: border_incident_desc;We have recently had a border incident
column2: stirring up trouble with a Great Power.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: bosnian_annexation_desc;The government feels it is vital to bring Bosnia more fully under our administration
column2: despite the international furore it might cause.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: Bourgeois_Coup_d'État!_desc; The Upper Crust of the nation have won the elections
column2: and not only have they been elected
column3: there was a Coup D'etat in the leadership of the nation. Your nation is now again run by the rich
column4: may the divine have mercy on the Proletariat in the coming years.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: boxer_agitation_desc;Our efforts to suppress the Boxers in this province has angered them
column2: turning these nationalists against our government.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: boxer_presence_desc;The Righteous Harmony Society is present in this province
column2: disrupting regular trade as they act against foreign influence.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: brandenburg_prussia_desc;Being in posession of the old German territories occupied by Poland-Lithuania we can now unite the country as one;;;;;;x;;
brandenburg_prussia2_desc;Prussia has been released from Poland-Lithuania and now is our chance to unite our country's crown.;;;;;;x;;
brandenburg_prussia3_desc;The personal union between Brandenburg and Prussia has been everlasting. This is the moment to strengthen our relationship and unite.;;;;;;x;;
breakup_british_empire_desc;Although we have conquered the British isles
column2: the empire has survived in the hearts and minds of many. By instituting a British state we can divide the population and take away many of the dissenters
column3: and by breaking up the empire we can create several highly loyal nations to keep check on the Brits.;;;;;;x

column1: build_addis_ababa_desc;Founded in 1886 by Emperor Menelik II
column2: Addis Ababa would become the capital of Ethiopia and the site of the Imperial Palace.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: build_bigben_desc;Building this magnificient clock tower to accompany the reconstruction of the Palace of Westminster which was largely destroyed by a fire in 1834 would increase the prestige of our nation and bolster $COUNTRY_ADJ$ identity.;x;;;;;;;;;

build_eiffeltower_desc;Building this great lattice tower in Paris would show the world what $COUNTRY_ADJ$ engineering can achieve and provide an impressive and prestigious landmark for the city.;x;;;;;;;;;

build_panama_canal_mod_desc;Proposals for a Canal across the Panama Isthmus probably date back to the first discovery of the area. Nowhere is the strip of land that unites the North and South American continents thinner than here
column2: and
column3: with the aid of modern engineering
column4: we could shorten the travel time between the Atlantic and The Pacific by several days by building it. Reserve at least $190
column5: 000 before starting construction.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: linking the Pacific and Atlantic coasts
column3: is a dream that will ensure the unity of Canada-- though it is an expensive dream
column4: to be sure.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: builduptowar;Building up to war;Moins de $VAL$ souhaitent une réforme sociale.;Weniger als $VAL$ wollen soziale Reformen.;;Menos de $VAL$ quieren reformas sociales.;;;;;;;;x;

builduptowarDESC;We are readying the masses for the possibility of war.;Au moins $VAL$ souhaitent une réforme sociale.;Mindestens $VAL$ wollen soziale Reformen.;;Al menos $VAL$ quieren reformas sociales.;;;;;;;;x;
Bull_market_desc;We are experiencing an economic boom
column2: with factories enjoying greater production and the people readily buying what luxuries they can while times are good.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: buy_east_prussia_desc;Russia has offered to sell East Prussia back to us.;;;;;;x
canadian_dominion_desc;The Confederation of Canada now has self-rule. Our dominion is ours to govern
column2: as a new and emerging power not only within North America but in the world.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: census_desc;A national census is currently being conducted.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
centralizer_act_huayna_capac_desc;As the central government grows stronger
column2: the Confederation becomes more and more an unitary state. The 'Centralizer Act Huayna Capac' concentrates even more power in the president and creates the United Republic of Peru-Bolivia.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: central_plan_desc;The revolution is complete - the capitalists have been overthrown
column2: and now the proletariat must rule. We no longer need capitalist greed to drive out economy
column3: but instead trough public ownership and central economic planning
column4: the state can organise and direct the economy to benefit of all.;;;;;;x;;

column1: change_national_value_off_desc;Turn off the function to change the National Value.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
change_national_value_on_desc;Turn on the function to change the National Value.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
christian_repression_desc;Taiping missionaries are being actively repressed in this province.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
citizenship_tests_desc;Those many immigrants that make their way to our lands will prove that they know what it means to be free.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_arabia_ASR_desc;We must claim the rest of the peninsula if we are to unite all of Arabia under our rule!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_arabia_HDJ_desc;We must claim the eastern lands in Nejd and Hail if we are to unite all of Arabia under our rule!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_arabian_peninsula_desc;We must unite all of the Arabian peninsula under our rule
column2: including all of the Trucial States
column3: Oman

column1: claim_austrian_silesia_desc;The provinces of Bielsko and Tesin are rightfully Czech lands
column2: having once belonged to Bohemia. We must reclaim them as our own.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_center_america_desc;It is time to claim our rights in the Central American territories !;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_greater_albania_desc;The lands of ethnic Albanians must be reunited with the motherland
column2: no matter where they might live.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_greater_bengal_desc;The Bengal Empire once ruled over much of eastern India
column2: and the time has come to once again restake our claim. We must strike a blow against the forces of imperialism!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_greater_bengal2_desc;The Bengal Empire once ruled over much of eastern India
column2: and the time has come to once again restake our claim. We must strike a blow against the forces of imperialism!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_greater_mongolia_desc;The lands of ethnic Mongolians must be reunited with the motherland
column2: no matter where they might live.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_hail_desc;We cannot unite all of Arabia under our banner unless we control the northern provinces. The House of Saud must stand dominant!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_hedjaz_HAL_desc;We must claim the western lands in Hedjaz if we are to unite all of Arabia under our rule!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_hedjaz_NEJ_desc;We must claim the western lands in Hedjaz if we are to unite all of Arabia under our rule!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: our nation feels threatened. The 'line of advantage' means that protecting our borders means extending our influence beyond them
column3: and thus we must move to claim the Korean peninsula and wrest it from those who hold it in their grasp-- in the name of Korean freedom

column1: claim_mayan_lands_desc;The time has come for the Mayan people to reclaim what they have lost!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_natalia_desc;The Natal is boer territory and rightfully belongs as part of our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_nejd_desc;We cannot unite all of Arabia under our banner unless we control the central provinces. The House of Rashid must stand dominant!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_north_cape_colony_desc;The northern cape colony rightfully belongs to us. We must take steps to assert our claim
column2: before our African ambitions come to naught.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the northern Caucasus region belongs as part of our country just as do its people.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_oranje_desc;The territory of the Orange Free State is Boer land and rightfully belongs as part of our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_sakhalin_desc;Russia has ruled lands on Sakhalin Island for some time now
column2: and much of the archipelago's population is Russian. It's time we let the world know that we consider these lands to be a core Russian territory
column3: which we will defend to the last!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_santa_catarina_desc;Our fellow rebels in the neighboring province of Santa Catarina must be liberated. The Juliana Republic must be freed from Brazilian rule!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_savoy_desc;Our condition for allowing the unification of Italy was control over Savoie. We cannot
column2: after all
column3: permit the Italians to have control over the passes through the Alps-- not unless they are under our influence. Seeing as that is not the case
column4: me must press our claims to Nice and Savoie even if it means war with a united Italy.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_schleswig_desc;The duchies of Schleswig and Holstein have long been united and considered indivisible under the Danish crown
column2: but a question of royal claim to the duchies combined with the Holsteinian desire to join in the larger German Confederation to the south has led to considerable difficulty for King Frederick VII. The treatment of Danish people in Schleswig living under Holsteinian domination has led to a call for the duchy to be incorporated into Denmark proper. This is unlikely to be looked on favorably by the conservative German aristocracy in Holstein.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_tatar_lands_desc;Now that the Tatars are strong once again
column2: we must reclaim the historical lands of Tartary!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_transvaal_desc;The Transvaal is boer territory and rightfully belongs as part of our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_xhosa_lands_desc;The Xhosa lands rightfully belong to the Cape Colony
column2: and the colonial governor has made a formal request to the British government to adminster the lands to protect colonist safety along the border.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: closed_country_policy_desc;We are stopping anyone from leaving and entering the country.;;;;;;x
code_civil_desc;The French civil code was established under NapolEEon I in 1804. The code forbade privileges based on birth
column2: allowed freedom of religion
column3: and specified that government jobs should go to the most qualified.;;;;;;x;;

column1: colonial_destiny_desc;It is the destiny of the Belgian people to civilize the last remaining wilds of the world. To Africa!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

colonial_points_desc;This a decision specifically designed to give you extra free colonial points in order to overcome a bug that has arised. This bug asks for unatural high colonial points to convert a colony into state. IT IS RECOMMENDED THAT YOU USE IT ONLY WHEN THIS BUG ARISES OTHERWISE IT WOULD BE A CLEAR CHEAT !;;;;;;;;;;;;x
commie_purged_desc;Every month the world hears new rumours of massacres of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ upper class. While whether they are aware of the full scale of the brutality is debatable
column2: these reports are sure to hurt our international reputation for years to come.;;;;;;x

column1: commited_genocide_desc;Every month the world hears new rumours of massacres of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ upper class. While whether they are aware of the full scale of the brutality is debatable
column2: these reports are sure to hurt our international reputation for years to come.;;;;;;x

column1: commodore_perry_expedition_desc;The Far East remains an enigma
column2: and one which is beyond the reach of most western powers due to the enforced seclusion of China and Japan. While China is largely spoken for
column3: Japan remains a potential target for American influence to expand. If we are to be taken seriously as a world power
column4: we must consider sending a force to negotiate for trade rights with the Japanese-- under the threat of military force
column5: if necessary.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: communist_purge_desc;The realisation of the communist dream of a classless utopia requires the extinction of the old order. A great purge would eliminate all who are deemed a threat to the party!;;;;;;x
communist_stronghold_desc;This region is considered a stronghold of communist support within the country.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

conduct_census_desc;The make-up of our country's population has changed so much and so rapidly that it is clear an effort must be undertaken to catalogue our population. Let us discover who is who in our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
conference_desc;A grand display of our nation's scientific prowess. Let us bring the intelligentsia together in the capital
column2: so that great minds may share ideas and advance our country's interests.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: conference1_desc;A grand display of our nation's scientific prowess. Let us bring the intelligentsia together in the capital
column2: so that great minds may share ideas and advance our country's interests.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: conference2_desc;A grand display of our nation's scientific prowess. Let us bring the intelligentsia together in the capital
column2: so that great minds may share ideas and advance our country's interests.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: conference3_desc;A grand display of our nation's scientific prowess. Let us bring the intelligentsia together in the capital
column2: so that great minds may share ideas and advance our country's interests.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: conference4_desc;A grand display of our nation's scientific prowess. Let us bring the intelligentsia together in the capital
column2: so that great minds may share ideas and advance our country's interests.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: conference5_desc;A grand display of our nation's scientific prowess. Let us bring the intelligentsia together in the capital
column2: so that great minds may share ideas and advance our country's interests.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: conference6_desc;A grand display of our nation's scientific prowess. Let us bring the intelligentsia together in the capital
column2: so that great minds may share ideas and advance our country's interests.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: conquest_of_the_desert_desc;A proposal has been brought forth to finally push into the southern Patagonian lands and pacify them once and for all. Argentina must make its claim so none can deny us.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
conservative_stronghold_desc;This region is considered a stronghold of conservative support within the country.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the Russian Empire has recognized the Aigun river and the Stanovoy mountains as the natural frontiers between Russia and China. There are many within the government
column3: however
column4: who believe it would be in our best interest to access a southern port upon the Sea of Japan-- namely the Chinese city of HaIshenwai. Considering the Chinese only barely control their northeastern provinces
column5: it seems within our right to negotiate for their control and with their state of turmoil now if the best time to approach them.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: core_integration_desc;The province is being integrated into the rest of the country
column2: a slow process that may cause problems here.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: cores_of_the_afs_desc;We organized the Kingdom of New Austria;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
coup_risk_desc;There is dissension within the nation's military
column2: one that is leading to a breakdown of order not only within the ranks but within the country itself. Some fear the army will rise up and take over the government.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: create_baltic_states_desc;Uniting the Baltic nations under a single flag
column2: as a puppet to our nation
column3: will make for a much stronger ally.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: the Cambodians have requested that we allow them to join the Dai Viet in protection by our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: create_iberia_desc;We have proven our mettle and united the Iberian peninsula under our rule. Now the time has come for a new Iberian federation to be born
column2: one that unites all of the peninsula's cultures under a single rule.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: create_iberia2_desc;We have proven our mettle and united the Iberian peninsula under our rule. Now the time has come for a new Iberian federation to be born
column2: one that unites all of the peninsula's cultures under a single rule.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: create_kashmir_desc;For the good of the Empire
column2: we should create a new Princely State in the northern dominion of Kashmir.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: create_laos_protectorate_desc;The Laotians will not be able to stand against their much larger neighbours not without our help. We should approach them and offer our protection. The civilized thing to do.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
create_malaya_desc;A unified and civilized federation of the Malay peoples will provide a stronger ally for our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
create_panjab_desc;For the good of the Empire
column2: we should create a new Princely State in the northern dominion of Panjab.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: create_romania_desc;A united and free Romania will make a formidable and valuable ally.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
create_space_agency_desc;We have the technology and the resources to start exploring the vast expanses of space. Who knows what secrets are waiting to be discovered out there.;;;;;;x
create_tibet_desc;For the good of the Empire
column2: we should create a new Princely State in the northern dominion of Tibet.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: create_transcaucasia_desc;The nations of the southern Caucasus must be united together
column2: a vassal that will serve as a loyal and mighty ally to our country.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: create_yugoslavia_desc;If the Slavic peoples of the Balkans are united under a single flag
column2: they will be a far more useful ally then as separate and constantly warring states.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: create_yunnan_desc;For the good of the Empire
column2: we should create a new Princely State in the eastern dominion of Yunnan.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: customs_union_desc;We are a member of a customs union
column2: designed to reduce the barriers in trade between the member nations.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: cut_japan_war_supplies_desc;The imperial ambitions of Japan are unacceptable
column2: we must do our utmost to undermine their war capabilities even if it must lead to war.;;;;;;x

column1: declare_neutrality_desc;The Swiss have little interest in the wars of Europe.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
demand_montenegro_lands_desc;Demand that the Ottomans return Montenegran lands to our control.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
demand_retreat_from_india_desc;The majority of India has been wrested from British control. A choice is upon us: either demand their retreat from the sub-continent
column2: freeing all their vassals and annexed lands
column3: or continue our war and hope to achieve our current goals. A British retreat may result in chaos
column4: and we certainly would not attain the war goals we have in play
column5: but it would at least take the British out of the equation for the years to come.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: demand_serb_lands_TUR_desc;Demand that the Ottomans return Serbian lands to our control.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
demand_thessaly_desc;Demand that the Ottomans return Thessaly to our control.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
desc_democracy_in_danger_a;Anarcho-Liberals have gained influence and threaten to overthrow our government.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
democracy_in_danger_c;The Old Order Is In Danger!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
desc_democracy_in_danger_c;Communists have gained influence and threaten to overthrow our government.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
democracy_in_danger_f;The Old Order Is In Danger!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
desc_democracy_in_danger_f;Fascists have gained influence and threaten to overthrow our government.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
democracy_in_danger_r;The New Order Is In Danger!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
desc_democracy_in_danger_r;Reactionaries have gained influence and threaten to overthrow our government.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
dismantle_hre_desc;We are at war with the Holy Roman Emperor
column2: if we can besiege his palace in his capital city we could force him to dissolve the empire.;;;;;;x;;

column1: dreams_of_empire_desc;We dream not only of an empire to span the world
column2: but also of a cultural empire. Our people stand as civilized beings
column3: and it is our imperative to bestow the gift of our knowledge upon others. Let the world know of our desires
column4: for we shall find a place of prominence within it.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: at any cost!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: drone_campaign_ABU_title;Initiate Drone Campaign in the United Arab Emirates;x;;;;;;;;;
drone_campaign_ABU_desc;A drone campaign would help counter insurgents in this country and stabilise the region.;x;;;;;;;;;
dutch_east_india_desc;Greatest of the jewels in our nation's crown is the East Indies colony.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
early_plague_mod_desc;A plague is ravaging our lands!;;;;;;x;;

economic_reforms_desc;The Chineese economy has seen a massive growth since China's industrialization period. If we can open our markets for foreign investement and continue the way we have been industrialing for the past few decades
column2: we will no doubt be the strongest economic power in Asia or even the world!;;;;;;x;;
Queen Isabella II decreed the establishment of a free public shool system in the Phillipines that used Spanish as the language of instruction
column3: leading to an increasing number of educated Filipinos. This would be the first in a number of colonial initiatives that rendered the Phillipines as one of the few places in the world where it was said to have visibly improved and prospered under colonial rule.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: election_cooldown_desc;Our voters are currently debating and discussing all important issues.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
embrace_albanians_YUG_desc;The Albanians are not truly a Slavic culture
column2: and notoriously at odds with the rest of the Slavs. With enough effort
column3: however
column4: it should not be impossible to integrate them more fully into the Yugoslav culture and government. Perhaps this might even mean a future of peace between our peoples.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: embrace_bosnians_YUG_desc;The Bosniaks are historically a Muslim culture
column2: and notoriously at odds with the rest of the Slavs. With enough effort
column3: however
column4: it should not be impossible to integrate them more fully into the Yugoslav culture and government. Perhaps this might even mean a future of peace between our peoples.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: embrace_bulgarians_YUG_desc;The Bulgarians often do not consider themselves true Slavs
column2: or perhaps they simply think themselves superior? Either way relations with the Bulgarians have been difficult. With enough effort
column3: however
column4: it should not be impossible to integrate them more fully into the Yugoslav culture and government. Perhaps this might even mean a future of peace between our peoples.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: embrace_croat_minority_desc;We shall embrace our Croat citizens
column2: and elevate them to the status shared by that of the Hungarians.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: embrace_czech_minority_desc;We shall embrace our Czech citizens
column2: and elevate them to the status shared by that of the Hungarians.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: embrace_estonians_desc;Long considered distant cousins of the scandinavians
column2: our Estonian citizens should be recognized as full and equal members of our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: embrace_greeks_YUG_desc;The Greeks are not truly a Slavic culture
column2: and notoriously at odds with the rest of the Slavs. With enough effort
column3: however
column4: it should not be impossible to integrate them more fully into the Yugoslav culture and government. Perhaps this might even mean a future of peace between our peoples.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: embrace_old_norse_desc;Having successfully united Scandinavia we are now witnessing a dynamic revival of its culture. This has led to a curious occurence whereby several individuals in our ruling elite have gone back to the old Norse faith
column2: rejecting Christianity as a corrupt Southern religion. We could ourselves adopt this religion on behalf of the country.;x;;;;;;;;;

column1: embrace_old_rome_desc;Having successfully created a new Roman Empire we are now witnessing a dynamic revival of its culture. This has led to a curious occurence whereby several individuals in our ruling elite have gone back to the old Roman faith
column2: rejecting Christianity as a corrupt religion. We could ourselves adopt this religion on behalf of the country.;x;;;;;;;;;

column1: embrace_polish_minority_desc;We shall embrace our Polish citizens
column2: and elevate them to the status shared by that of the Hungarians.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: embrace_slovene_minority_desc;We shall embrace our Slovene citizens
column2: and elevate them to the status shared by that of the Hungarians.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: emigration_stop_desc;Closing our borders to both immigrants and emigrants would affect the way we conduct international diplomacy and trade but would also enable us to forge a more homogenous society free of foreign influence.;;;;;;x
emigration_stopstop_desc;Maybe it is time to reopen our borders and enter into a more harmonious relationship with the rest of the world.;;;;;;x

column2: an Albanian born in Macedonia during Ottoman rule there
column3: served in the Kavala Volunteer Contingent of the Ottoman Army in Egypt during the first years of the 19th century. Following the withdrawal of Napoleon's armies from Egypt Muhammad
column4: through a long series of political maneuvering
column5: came to be elected Wali (governor) of Ottoman Egypt
column6: a position he would eventually use to secure Egypt as his own personal domain as Mamluk power waned. During his reign he instituted a series of more or less popular
column7: and more or less successful
column8: reforms
column9: all aiming to transform Egypt into a modern
column10: european-style
column11: state. The resistance to these reforms will slow down progress for a time
column12: but the benefit to Egypt itself will be immeasurable.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: encourage_arab_nationalism_desc;The way to truly fight the Ottoman Empire is to dismantle it from within. We must encourage their Arab minorities to rise up and seek their own destiny as independent nations.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
encourage_old_faith_desc;We could allocate some money to fund a program to encourage our subjects to convert to our religion.;x;;;;;;;;;
encourage_old_faith_mod_desc;We are encouraging our subjects to convert to our pagan beliefs.;x;;;;;;;;;
end_danube_federation_desc;The concept of the Danubian Federation is no longer valid. We no longer control the territories that were once part of our nation
column2: and thus the time has come to give up the fiction and become Austria once more in truth.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_confederation_BOL_desc;As Bolivia is not connected to Peru anymore
column2: the Confederacy can be declared extinct.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_confederation_PEU_desc;As Peru is not connected to Bolivia anymore
column2: the Confederacy can be declared extinct.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_confederation_SPU_desc;As South Peru is not connected to Bolivia anymore
column2: the Confederacy can be declared extinct.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_czechoslovakia_bohemia_desc;The union of Bohemia and Slovakia has been sundered. It is time to bring Czechoslovakia to an end.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_czechoslovakia_slovakia_desc;The union of Bohemia and Slovakia has been sundered. It is time to bring Czechoslovakia to an end.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_hungarian_revolution_desc;There is no hope for us to continue. Our revolutionaries stand defeated and our country occupied-- we must submit!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_iberia_portugal_desc;The Iberian union is no longer the truth. We must put aside the fiction and become Portugal in truth.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_iberia_spain_desc;The Iberian union is no longer the truth. We must put aside the fiction and become Spain in truth.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_of_NGF_ANH_desc;With the loss of our lands
column2: we must face a bitter truth and realize that claiming we are more than Anhalt is a conceit we cannot afford. Let the truth become reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_of_NGF_BRA_desc;With the loss of our lands
column2: we must face a bitter truth and realize that claiming we are more than Brunswick is a conceit we cannot afford. Let the truth become reality.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
