column1: desc_ev_20000043;"The modern carousel emerged from early jousting traditions in Europe and the Middle East. Knights would gallop in a circle while tossing balls from one to another; an activity that required great skill and horsemanship. This game was introduced to Europe at the time of the Crusades from earlier Byzantine and Arab traditions. The word carousel originated from the Italian garosello and Spanish carosella (""little battle""
column2: used by crusaders to describe a combat preparation exercise and game played by Turkish and Arabian horsemen in the 12th century). This early device was essentially a cavalry training mechanism; it prepared and strengthened the riders for actual combat as they wielded their swords at the mock enemies.";;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000082;"Torricelli's chief invention was the mercury barometer. ""This instrument is named from two Greek words

column6: sealed at the top
column7: filled it with mercury
column8: and set it vertically into a basin of mercury. The column of mercury fell to about 76 cm
column9: leaving a Torricellian vacuum above. As we now know
column10: the column's height fluctuated with changing atmospheric pressure; this was the first barometer. The discovery of the principle of the barometer has perpetuated his fame (""Torricellian tube""

column1: desc_ev_20000090;Johan Palmstruch had made two failed proposals for the creation of a banking institution in the 1650s before his third proposal

column1: desc_ev_20000099;The first short-lived attempt at issuing banknotes by a central bank was in 1661 by Stockholms Banco
column2: a predecessor of the Bank of Sweden. These replaced the copper-plates being used instead as a means of payment. This banknote issue was brought about by the peculiar circumstances of the Swedish coin supply. Cheap foreign imports of copper had forced the Crown to steadily increase the size of the copper coinage to maintain its value relative to silver. The heavy weight of the new coins encouraged merchants to deposit it in exchange for receipts. These became banknotes when the manager of the Bank decoupled the rate of note issue from the bank currency reserves.;;;;;;x;;

column2: following the other revolutions in the world. We watch as the firstly peaceful riots turn into a bloody conflict. The only thing we can do to keep these lands is to establish a free state
column3: belonging to us to calm the Serb mob.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000335;After its junta being formed Chile has also declared its own government
column2: leaving Spanish rule. We may try to retake these colonies aswell
column3: but surely the local unrest would be even higher afterwards.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000336;We have finally adopted a flag to represent our country. With thirteen stripes and stars equal to the amount of states belonging to us. Our people shall be proud of this new national symbol.;;;;;;x;;

column2: the leading revolutionary who helped many nation to freedom has created the nation of Gran Colombia uniting the newly freed Colombia with our nation of Venezuela. Spain won't be able to stop us.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000338;With our colonies abandoning us we could only try and protect what little we have. The riots in Florida have been beaten down for now
column2: but we can never be sure
column3: so we chose to sell it instead to the USA in return of not attacking our holdings in Texas.;;;;;;x;;

column2: the Burlington Arcade has opened in London visited by mostly the royal members and the nobility
column3: allowing them to forget their everyday problems and focus on buying new things of their taste.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000340;An ancient statue has been discovered on the isle of Milos of the ancient greek godess
column2: Venus. It shall be put on display once it was closely inspected by our scientists and historians.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000341;With the growing nationalism in the world the greeks have also formed their own movement
column2: declaring independence from our authority and gathering their citizens in order to fight our armies back. Our reconquest shall be swift.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000342;The colony of Peru has declared independence from our nation
column2: overthrowing the local governor and forming their own government. We shall try to retake them by force
column3: but our holdings in the Americas are shrinking rapidly.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_20000343;Central American States Gain Local Authority;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000343;The mini states of Central America have been granted with local authority in order to keep them with us for now.;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000344;The colony of Panama has declared independence
column2: but instead of forming a local government they chose to join the existing Gran Colombian Union in order to protect themself better
column3: which they might not be able to do themselves.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000345;The Dominican Republic has declared independence in the eastern part of Hispaniola. With our colonies shrinking rapidly we still should be able to retake them to keep a footholding in South America.;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000346;With the neighbouring Spanish colony rebelling this is the best possible time for us to gain some more land
column2: and the total control of Hispaniola. It should be easy to take them over
column3: since they are still not that well organized
column4: and the Spanish forces are still far away.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000347;With the growing nationalism in the Americas our colony of Brazil has also declared its independence from us with the leadership of a self-proclaimed emperor
column2: Peter I. We should try our best and retake what is de jure ours.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000349;With the death of our emperor who didn't appoint a heir we can only do one thing to avoid falling into an inner conflict
column2: we shall declare a democracy with strong centralized
column3: presdential leadership.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000350;The United States of Central America
column2: a coalition of the Central American mini states have declared their own government and independence from us and any other power. As we previously already given them the possibility of local authority we do not wish to start a war for those mostly useless lands.;;;;;;x;;
the liberator of most South American nations has been proclaimed the dictator of our country
column3: to lead it to a better future. He was relunctant at first
column4: but he accepted it after all to the joy of our people.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000352;With the continent of New Holland mostly under our supervision we chose to follow an older plan to rename the continent into something more distinctive
column2: Australia.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000353;The people of Uruguay have chosen to secede from our nation and try to take part in the world politics on their own. Of course we do not wish to go into war so early in our free nations history
column2: so we decided to let them go freely
column3: for now.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000355;After the perfection of the steam engine and the creation of steel that could support the weight of a so called locomotive
column2: a cart moved by a steam engine on set steel tracks we could succesfully create the very first public
column3: mainly freight railroad in the history
column4: connecting Colliery to a river port.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000357;A bridge connecting the island of Anglesey and Wales has been needed for a long time
column2: but since this location was heavy with sea traffic we could not construct a bridge until now
column3: with the invention of suspension bridges
column4: from which one of the first ones has been built here.;;;;;;x;;

column2: a religious text of two hundred and twelve verses has been completed in Sanskrit by Bhangwan Swaminarayan
column3: that is considered to be a key scripture of the mentioned holy man's followers and the basis of the sect. It is a detailed text about the ways of living a spiritually uplifting life.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000359;Following our empire's loss of power the sultan of our nation decided to reform our most elite unit
column2: the Janissaries in a Western European manner. This allowed us to regain some of our lost respect and fear from the bordering nations.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000360;After being released peacefully by Brazil they went against their promise and attacked us. Luckily the neighbouring country of Argentina has came to our aid
column2: starting the so called Cisplatinate War.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000361;A new tool to make writing easier
column2: the fountain pen has been invented by a Romanian inventor
column3: called Petrarche Poenaru. Of course this new invention was instantly given royal patent and was started to be mass produced by factories and applied to administrative useage.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000362;The city of Turku has been completely destroyed
column2: killing a large portion of the local residents by a fire unlike any before. We could do nothing as it spread to every district
column3: nothing could stop it at all. May God have mercy on the victims' souls.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000363;A larger typhoon has reached our shores today
column2: killing many people and destroying farms and houses aswell. Luckily it was a mostly rural place
column3: but the damage is still very high.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000364;Following the unsuccesful war for freedom
column2: under the pressure of the European nation we had no choice but to give Greece local autonomy and a separate government
column3: while still holding them as a vassal.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000365;"A debate took place today between Senator Daniel Webster of Massachusetts and Senator Robert Y. Hayne of South Carolina on the topic of protectionist tariffs. The heated speeches between Webster and Hayne themselves were unplanned
column2: and stemmed from debate over a resolution by Connecticut Senator Samuel A. Foot calling for the temporary suspension of further land surveying until land already on the market was sold (this would effectively stop the introduction of new lands onto the market). Webster's ""Second Reply to Hayne"" was generally regarded as ""the most eloquent speech ever delivered in Congress."" ";;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000366;While our coalition has served its pupose to keep Spain from regaining its territories from us
column2: the people of Ecuador chose not to continue its membership in it. It could be because of any reasons
column3: but we must accept their decision and let them go as a free state.;;;;;;x;;

column2: that we succesfully separated from Spain we can concentrate on stabilizing the country
column3: and the first step towards it shall be to create our first constitution based on the modern European thoughts
column4: creating a free democracy.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000368;With our armies mostly tied down in Europe we have lesser power to project to our colonies leading to unrest
column2: as they try following the way of the Spanish colonies. But we'll have none from that
column3: so we set up a new army
column4: the Foreign Legion to be recruited from any non-French citizen
column5: trained and sent off to our colonies to keep up the peace.;;;;;;x;;

column2: following the new nationalistic thoughts have risen up like the Serbians and the Greeks before to gain their independence
column3: of course this is against our interests so we must reclaim our lands before some Western power chose to support their cause.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000370;A disease called cholera has started spreading in the city of London killing many people
column2: but luckily nowhere near what the plague did
column3: thanks to the modern medications and the somewhat better standard of living.;;;;;;x;;

column2: a strategist and soldier of our nation has written a book regarding militar tactics that has been published now
column3: after his death. It is called Vom Kriege and it shall become a standard in the officer schools.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000372;Following the ideals of freedom we have completely abolished slavery and freeing every slave between our borders. From now on we will be able to force our views on other nations who are still stuck with the old ways of slavery.;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_20000373;A tariff-free union has been created between the cultural borders of Germany by us
column2: allowing our influence to spread to the german-speaking states
column3: getting closer to a united german state.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000374;The era of the inquisitions have ended with the beginning of a new
column2: greater era. We no longer have the need or support the idea of forcing religious teachings on someone.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000375;The Romanian language has been banned in the administration and the teaching system of the occupied part of Romania by us
column2: to stop
column3: or at least slow down the separatist tendencies.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000376;The first higher level facility in the free state of Mexico has been founded
column2: the Academy of Languages. This shall allow us to reach out scientific goals a bit quicker.;;;;;;x;;

column1: desc_ev_20000377;After the first well-working public railroad has been opened in the United Kingdom we chose to follow them by opening a railroad in the area of the city of Brussels.;;;;;;x;;

desc_ev_20000378;After the initial railroads being built in England and the Low Countries the first railroad has been opened around the area of the city of Nuremberg with the help of English engineers.;;;;;;x;;

desc_ev_20000379;After all of our South American colonies have declared their independence we thought that the rebellions have passed for good. But apparently not as the state of Texas has also declared independence
column2: seeking aid from the other
column3: succesfully separated states. We shall try everything to retake it.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ev_21000304;British Invasions of Rio de la Plata;;;;;;x;;
desc_ev_21000304;British Invasions of Rio de la Plata;;;;;;x;;
fallout_desc;The devastation brought upon us by our enemy's nuclear strike threatens to spread should the wind turn in this foul miasma's favour.;;;;;;x;;
Five_Year_Plan_desc;A Five Year Plan has been issued to help economic growth.;;;;;;x;;

found_quebec_desc;Samuel de Champlain has recently returned from an expedition to the land they call Quebec. He has since then asked the French government to support a new expedition with the goal of establishing a permanent settlement at the mouth of the St. Lawrence river.;;;;;;x;;
Franceset_DESC;War might be looming on the horizon
column2: but will it be a global war?;États confédérés d'Amérique;CSA;;EE CC;;;;;;;;;x

column1: free_and_fair_desc;Upholding democratic ideals has made our people more content with the status quo.;;;;;;x
fullmob_desc;We have fully mobilised our armed forces.;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x

column2: threatening others?;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x

column1: gandhimod_desc;Mahatma Gandhi is actively campaigning for Indian independence.;;;;;;x
gateway_to_america_desc;Many immigrants from Europe will pass through the gates of Ellis Island
column2: and a great number of them will remain in New York City.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: gateway_to_harbor_desc;Many immigrants from around the world will pass through our great city
column2: and a great number of them will remain.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: general_strike_desc;The entire country is experiencing a worker's strike
column2: greatly impacting our entire economy.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: genocide_desc;The fascist dream of a pure and utterly $COUNTRY_ADJ$ nation starts here. A genocide will rid $COUNTRY$ of most minorities.;;;;;;x

gesture_of_defiance_desc;We are a nation of growing power. It falls upon us to display to the so-called 'civilized' nations of the world that they cannot act with impunity. We will resist aggression in kind.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
Givingaid_DESC;We are currently giving aid to Mexico.;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x

global_population_reduction_desc;Global Population Reduction is a custom decision that allows you to reduce instantly reduce global population by 30%. IT IS NOT RECOMMENDED  THAT YOU USE IT AS IT IS NOT KNOWN HOW IT WILL AFFECT GAME BALANCE. It is only created for those that have low performance(game speed) in large populated scenarios (e.g. Millenium).;;;;;;;;;;;;x
gold_coast_treaty_desc;With the construction of the Suez Canal
column2: the importance of Sekondi to the Dutch has dwindled. We might be able to convince them to sell the colony to us
column3: solidifying our hold on the Gold Coast
column4: in exchange for reducing our influence in the East Indies.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: gran_colombia_by_sword_desc;If Gran Colombia is to exist once again
column2: we must lay claim to all its territory-- and reunite it by sword

column1: grand_army_desc;Our country possesses an army which is the marvel of the entire world!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
grand_exhibition_desc;Let us display to the world our nation's advanced culture.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
grand_exhibition2_desc;Let us display to the world our nation's advanced culture.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
grand_exhibition3_desc;Let us display to the world our nation's advanced culture.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
grand_exhibition4_desc;Let us display to the world our nation's advanced culture.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
grand_exhibition5_desc;Let us display to the world our nation's advanced culture.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
grand_exhibition6_desc;Let us display to the world our nation's advanced culture.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
grand_navy_desc;Our country possesses a navy which is the marvel of the entire world!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_afghanistan_desc;We are a power to be reckoned with. It is time that we claimed the lands that are part of our heritage!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_assyria_desc;Our people lie scattered  under the rule of foreign nations-- we must bring them under our banner and reclaim the lands which were once ours.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_finland_desc;We are a power to be reckoned with. It is time that we claimed the lands that are part of our heritage!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_macedonia_desc;All Macedonians must rightfully fall under the Macedonian flag!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_nepal_desc;The time has come to revoke the Sugauli Treaty and take back that which was taken from us. Greater Nepal must be restored!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_serbia_desc;Many Serbs live throughout the Balkans. It is our duty to unite all of them under the Serbian flag!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
greater_turkey_desc;We must strive to restore the Greater Turkish Empire
column2: one that stretches throughout the Middle East rather than in Europe.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: greater_ukraine_desc;All Ukrainians must rightfully fall under the Ukrainian flag!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
great_game_makran_title;The Great Game Comes to Makran;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
great_game_makran_desc;The Dominion of Makran is experiencing too many internal difficulties
column2: and is seemingly approaching the point of open rebellion. We cannot risk the state falling
column3: thus handing other powers an opportunity to strike.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: great_game_panjab_title;The Great Game Comes to Panjab;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
great_game_makran_desc;The Dominion of Panjab is experiencing too many internal difficulties
column2: and is seemingly approaching the point of open rebellion. We cannot risk the state falling
column3: thus handing other powers an opportunity to strike.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: great_game_sindh_title;The Great Game Comes to Sindh;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
great_game_sindh_desc;The Dominion of Sindh is experiencing too many internal difficulties
column2: and is seemingly approaching the point of open rebellion. We cannot risk the state falling
column3: thus handing other powers an opportunity to strike.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: great_war_desc;We are in a state of total war with our enemies. We must rise up as one
column2: or risk the destruction of our entire way of life.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: great_war2;The Demands of War;Les Demandes de la Guerre;Die Nachfragen des Krieges;;;;;;;;;;;x
great_war2_desc;Massive shortages are causing our people's enthusiasm for war to dim.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
great_war3;Is It All For Nothing?;Est-il Tout Pour Rien?;Ist Alles Für Nichts?;;;;;;;;;;;x
great_war3_desc;If we do not end the war soon
column2: things will go very badly for us.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: ground_zero_desc;The recent nuclear strike against us has left this place barren and lifeless. A once vibrant metropolis is now the heart of the evil that has befallen $COUNTRY$.;;;;;;x;;
growing_unrest_desc;People are losing faith in their government and may even resort to armed revolution;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: our decision to carry out a nuclear strike against another country has undoubtedly shaken the international's community faith in our nation.;;;;;;x
or 'Imperial Reform Edict'
column3: will take the concept of Ottomanism-- the belief that equality among the Empire's religious groups will solve its social issues-- to the logical conclusion. Full rights will be granted to the Empire's minorities
column4: and laws passed to grant each millet the right to use  the religious law of its population. This will go a long way towards dealing with some of the nationalist strife the country has suffered
column5: and bring the Ottoman Empire into a new and multicultural age.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: or 'Imperial Reform Edict'
column3: will take the concept of Ottomanism-- the belief that equality among the Empire's religious groups will solve its social issues-- to the logical conclusion. Full rights will be granted to the Empire's minorities
column4: and laws passed to grant each millet the right to use  the religious law of its population. This will go a long way towards dealing with some of the nationalist strife the country has suffered
column5: and bring the Ottoman Empire into a new and multicultural age.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: or 'Imperial Reform Edict'
column3: will cement the Islamic rule over the Empire. It will go a long way towards cementing peace within Anatolia and our southern lands
column4: and perhaps ensure that the Empire does not suffer the same discord and uncertainty that other great nations have who turn their back on tradition.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: hawaiian_purchase_desc;Interlopers have moved in on our claims in the Hawaiian Islands region. Considering we have friendly enough relations with them
column2: perhaps we should consider a purchase of the territory before we resort to war?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: hedjaz_independent_desc;It is clear that Egypt is no longer in a position to rule us. Thus it is time for the Hedjaz to find its own path.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
hide_custom_decisions_desc;This is a toggle button that allows you to hide from your Decisions Menu the following decisions that allow you to customize your game: International Apology
column2: Global Population Reduction
column3: Play Historical Countries
column4: Colonial Points and Make Game Harder. This Toggle button is created for the purpose of creating space in your Decisions Menu;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: hold_festival_of_britain_desc;The festival has been organised to mark the centenary of the Great Exhibition of 1851. It is intended to demonstrate Britain's contribution to civilisation
column2: past
column3: present
column4: and future
column5: in the arts
column6: in science and technology
column7: and in industrial design.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: holy_city_desc;Mecca is the center of all Islam. To hold it is to stand above all others
column2: and prove to them that the fate of all Islam lies in our hands.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: holy_roman_emperor_desc;You are the Holy Roman Emperor.;;;;;;x;;

column2: the taking of many wives
column3: and encourage their followers to have large families.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: hre_member;Member-State of the Holy Roman Empire;;;;;;x;;
hre_member_desc;We are part of the Holy Roman Empire.;;;;;;x;;
ibn_saud_desc;The time has come to unite all of the Arabian peninsula under our rule. Hedjaz must be taken
column2: in order for the Saudi nation to truly stand on its own.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: inherit_ryukyu_desc;The islands of Ryukyu have always had blood ties to both China and Japan. They must be brought into the fold with the rest of our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
integration_desc;The Afro-Brazillian people are becoming an inherent part of Brazillian culture. It is time for them to obtain a modicum of citizenship.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
integration_refusal_desc;The province is not being integrated into the rest of the country
column2: and being allowed to maintain its separate identity.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: international_apology_desc;We believe that it  is time to declare that we renounce our previous aggressive behaviour and are now ready to fully comply with International law and our International obligations to the global community.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
international_pariah_desc;We are a pariah in the international community for our aggressive policies.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
invest_in_irish_desc;In order to bring the Irish up to par as an integral part of the British Empire
column2: a great deal of investment will be needed-- to not only upgrade the decaying institutions which have been governing the island for centuries
column3: but to also end the system of absentee landowners which so pervades the island's bureaucracy and which makes it a model of inefficiency. Only once that is done can the Irish begin to be integrated as equal subjects under British law.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: invite_bosnia_to_YUG_desc;Our Bosnian neighbours wold surely be willing to join the Slavic union. Perhaps we should extend a hand to them?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
invite_bulgaria_to_YUG_desc;While the Bulgarians are noticeably reluctant to assent to any kind of greater union of the Balkans
column2: perhaps with enough influence and good relations we can convince them to join us.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: invite_croatia_to_YUG_desc;Our Croatian neighbours wold surely be willing to join the Slavic union. Perhaps we should extend a hand to them?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
invite_greece_to_YUG_desc;While the Greeks are not truly considered part of the Slavic culture and are noticeably reluctant to assent to any kind of greater union of the Balkans
column2: perhaps with enough influence and good relations we can convince them to join us.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: invite_macedonia_to_YUG_desc;While the Macedonians are noticeably reluctant to assent to any kind of greater union of the Balkans
column2: perhaps with enough influence and good relations we can convince them to join us.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: invite_montenegro_to_YUG_desc;Our Montenegrin neighbours wold surely be willing to join the Slavic union. Perhaps we should extend a hand to them?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
invite_serbia_to_YUG_desc;Our Serbian neighbours wold surely be willing to join the Slavic union. Perhaps we should extend a hand to them?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
invite_slovenia_to_YUG_desc;Our Slovenian neighbours wold surely be willing to join the Slavic union. Perhaps we should extend a hand to them?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
invite_williamIII_desc;King James II is becoming more and more of a problem. In order to avoid further troubles with the parliament we may have to choose another monarch. William III of Oranje
column2: a pretender to the English throne
column3: has a proper protestant background and promises to reconcile all factions in England. We could invite him to take the crown and become King of our country.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ionian_islands_question_desc;The Ionian Islands had been an amicable protectorate of the United Kingdom ever since the end of the Napoelonic Wars. In 1862 the protectorate was deemed too expensive to maintain
column2: and the islands were
column3: after two years of negotiations
column4: seceded to Greece.;Les Îles Ioniennes furent placées sous protectorat britannique et ce
column5: depuis la fin des guerres napoléoniennes. En 1862
column6: ce protectorat fut jugé trop onéreux à conserver et les îles furent
column7: au terme de deux ans de négociations
column8: rattachées à la Grèce.;Die ionischen Inseln waren seit dem Ende der napoleonischen Kriege ein Protektorat Großbritanniens gewesen. Im Jahr 1862 betrachtete man die Aufrechterhaltung dieses Protektorats als zu teuer
column9: und nach zweijährigen Verhandlungen wurden die Inseln an Griechenland abgetreten.;;Las islas Jónicas habían sido un protectorado amigo del Reino Unido desde el final de las Guerras Napoleónicas. En 1862 se decidió que el protectorado resultaba demasiado caro de mantener y las islas fueron
column10: tras dos años de negociación

column1: irish_integration_desc;Now that the Irish are equal subjects under British law
column2: steps may be taken to integrate them more fully into overall British culture.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: irish_oppression_desc;The system of absentee landownship has left Ireland a model of inefficiency
column2: and left the Irish continually struggling and rebelling against British rule for centuries.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: irradiated_desc;The land here has been exposed to an extreme amount of radiation
column2: many are fleeing and those who choose to stay face an uncertain fate.;;;;;;x

column1: italian_call_to_union_desc;The time has come to call upon the Italian people to rise up and unite under a common banner. Risorgimento must commence!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
iwakura_mission_desc;Now that we are a power to be reckoned with
column2: the western nations cannot ignore us. An idea has surfaced to send a diplomatic mission to the West
column3: to not only attempt a renogotiation of the unequal treaties forced upon our nation in weaker times but also to learn more of their ways and assist in our own modernization.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: japanese_sakhalin_desc;With Japan now in full control of Sakhalin and the Kurils
column2: the world must recognize that these islands are essentially part of the Japanese archipelago and know them by their Japanese names.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: jim_crow_desc;The Jim Crow laws mandate de jure racial segregation in all public facilities
column2: with a supposedly 'separate but equal' status for black Americans.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: join_british_commonwealth_desc;Our close ties with Britain allows us to join the British Commonwealth of Nations.;x;;;;;;;;;
join_california_desc;The people have called on us to unite under the California banner. Long live the Sons of Liberty!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
join_confederation_desc;Our position on the North American continent
column2: and our traditional cultural ties to Canada
column3: make it likely that Canada would be willing to negotiate our entrance into confederation. Doing this means our country will be annexed by Canada.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: join_fsa_desc;The people have called on us to unite under the new FSA banner. Long live the Sons of Liberty!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
join_kalmar_union_desc;The time has come for our nation to take part in the growing Scandinavian union.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
join_new_america_desc;The people have called on us to unite under the New America banner. Long live the Sons of Liberty!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
join_new_csa_desc;The people have called on us to unite under the new Confederate banner. Long live the South!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: we are in a position to aid the cause of Nationalist China. We must join our forces with theirs
column3: for the good of all!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: kalmar_union_desc;We have agreed in principle to a closer bond with the other Scandinavian nations.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
kanagawa_treaty_desc;With enough pressure placed on the Japanese
column2: they will be forced to the negotiating table. A treaty can be hammered out at Kanagawa which will see Japan opened to outside trade and influence
column3: and our superiority proven beyond the shadow of a doubt.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: kiel_canal;Kiel Canal;Kiel Canal;Kiel Canal;Kiel Canal;Kiel Canal;Kiel Canal;Kiel Canal;Kiel Canal;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
kiel_canal_dividend_desc;We are currently processing the receipts for ships having passed through the Kiel canal.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
komitet_gosudarstvennoy_bezopasnosti_desc;The KGB was a Soviet Intelligence Agency that operated from it's establishment in 1951 to the day it dissolved with the Soviet Union in 1991.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
krakow_form_galicia_desc;Now that we have liberated Galicia from foreign tyranny
column2: let us extend to its people the freedoms we ourselves hold dear. Long live free Galicia!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: land_of_opportunity_desc;We are the Land of the Free and the Home of the Brave
column2: a bastion of democracy in the world and a haven for its poor and dispossessed.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
a power to be reckoned with.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: lavish_exhibition_desc;We shall put on the finest display of our culture the world has ever seen!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
lavish_exhibition2_desc;We shall put on the finest display of our culture the world has ever seen!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
lavish_exhibition3_desc;We shall put on the finest display of our culture the world has ever seen!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
lavish_exhibition4_desc;We shall put on the finest display of our culture the world has ever seen!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
lavish_exhibition5_desc;We shall put on the finest display of our culture the world has ever seen!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
lavish_exhibition6_desc;We shall put on the finest display of our culture the world has ever seen!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
leader_of_kalmar_desc;We are the leader of the movement to unite the Scandinavian people under a single flag.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: a Holy Alliance was once formed between Prussia
column3: Austria and Russia. Perhaps the time has come to resurrect that alliance
column4: a common front between our three monarchies to stand against the wave of revolution and change and Europe?;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: a Holy Alliance was once formed between Prussia
column3: Austria and Russia. Perhaps the time has come to resurrect that alliance
column4: a common front between our three monarchies to stand against the wave of revolution and change and Europe?;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: leave_hre_desc;We may leave the Holy Roman Empire if we so desire. By doing so however we would renounce the protection of the emperor.;;;;;;x;;
leave_soi_title;We Will Stand on our Own;;;;;;;;;;;;x
leave_soi_desc;Too long have we bent knee to unwanted foreigners. We must prove to them that our nation is a power to be reckoned with
column2: and reject their influence within our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: liberal_stronghold_desc;This region is considered a stronghold of liberal support within the country.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: or the 'line of advantage'
column3: means that we must extend Japanese influence beyond our national borders in order to ensure our security. This means turning all of the Japanese military
column4: and indeed our people
column5: to the notion of foreign conquest and glory.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: louisiana_purchasepart1_desc;We are in need of money and our lands in North America are both vulnerable and largely worthless. We could offer the Americans to buy them from us which would help our more immediate needs in Europe.;;;;;;x;;
louisiana_purchasepart2_desc;France has offered to sell Louisiana to us. While the worth of the land is doubtful it is a sizeable territoy and would more than double the size of this nation.;;;;;;x;;
louis_napoleon_iii_desc;Nephew and heir of Napoleon I
column2: he is a man of the people and carries with him a legacy that makes him seemingly invincible-- even if
column3: at times
column4: his decisions are reckless and of questionable military value.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: mars_colony_desc;We have the technology and the resources to establish and maintain a permanent $COUNTRY_ADJ$ settlement on Mars
column2: doing so will undoubtedly help our scientific research and the long-term exploitation of the planet's resources could prove immensely profitable.;;;;;;x

column1: may_day_desc;Our nation celebrates socialism. Let the greedy capitalists of the land shake in their boots!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
mediate_belgian_independence_desc;While Belgium's de facto independence from The Netherlands had been established by force of arms during the Belgian revolution of 1831
column2: it has not been confirmed de jure by The Netherlands and technically a state of war still exists between the two nations. The idea has arisen that the British Empire should step in and mediate a settlement
column3: demanding the Dutch give up their claims in return for guarantees of Belgian independence and control over Luxembourg. With the powers of Europe at the table
column4: it seems unlikely the Dutch would refuse.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: meiji_constitution_desc;After an exhaustive study of western democratic methods
column2: japanese scholars have settled on a method of government where the Emperor will preside over an Imperial Diet
column3: elected by the people and yet preserving both Imperial power as well as our traditions. This
column4: they believe
column5: is the best way for Japan to move forward into the modern era.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: militarise_mars_desc;Our Martian colonies have become very important to our nation over the years and following incidents with other colonies the creation of a Martian division of the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ armed forces was suggested. This so-called 'Mars Guard' would prevent further escalation of violence on the planet
column2: but may also alienate its residents.;;;;;;x

column1: military_parade_desc;Let us display our nation's armed forces in the streets. We are a power to be reckoned with
column2: and all the world will know it!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: military_strife_desc;We are battling with our own army to prevent them from taking over the government. Purges are not infrequent
column2: and the chances of soldiers defecting to join rebel causes raises with every passing day.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: minoan_excavations_desc;The secrets of the ancient Minoan civilization await!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
mombasa_sale_desc;The Mombasa coast is almost worthless to us
column2: but might be of value to the neighbouring colonial administration in Kenya. We should consider selling it for a tidy profit.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;

column1: mongolian_protectorate_desc;Our influence in Mongolia is such that we are in a position to pry the nation away from the Chinese and into our control. They would be our vassals
column2: benefiting from protection against Chinese claims on their land.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: moon_colony_desc;We have the technology and the resources to establish and maintain a permanent $COUNTRY_ADJ$ settlement on the Moon
column2: doing so will undoubtedly help our scientific research and the long-term exploitation of the satellite's resources could prove immensely profitable.;;;;;;x

column1: moret_law_desc;The Moret Law granted freedom to slaves in Puerto Rico born after 1868
column2: slaves who served in the Spanish Army
column3: slaves over 60 years old
column4: and slaves who were owned by the Spanish government. It was the first in a series of reforms that saw slavery ended in Peurto Rico
column5: well before it was ended in other Spanish colonies.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: move_capital_to_accra_desc;Accra provides a better capital for our nation-- we should move the government there at once.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
move_capital_to_algiers_desc;Algiers now belongs to us. It is time to move our government back to its proper place!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
move_capital_to_ankara_desc;Ankara is home to the Turkish national movement
column2: and a more defensible location away from European enemies.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: move_capital_to_atlanta_desc;Let us move the capital to Atlanta
column2: a city under our control and a cultural and historical center of the South.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: move_capital_to_bamako_desc;Niamey provides a better capital for Mali-- we should move the government there at once.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
move_capital_to_boston_desc;Let us move the capital to Boston
column2: a city under our control and a cultural and historical center of the North.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: move_capital_to_dar_es_salaam_desc;Dar-es-Salaam provides a better capital for Tanganyika-- we should move the government there at once.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: we should consider moving the capital to a more central-- and traditional-- city. Delhi: the heart of India.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
a Scandinavian Capital;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: move_capital_to_gothenburg_desc;Göteborg is the center of the Scandinavian nation and would be a perfect Capital for our great nation and further unite our people.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
move_capital_to_niamey_desc;Niamey provides a better capital for Niger-- we should move the government there at once.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
move_capital_to_philadelphia_desc;Let us move the capital to Philadelphia
column2: a city under our control and a cultural and historical center of the North.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: muhammad_alis_reforms_desc;We have instituted the reforms of Muhammad Ali
column2: and while these rapid advancements will slow down our progress in the short term
column3: the benefits to our military and our overall efficiency will be invaluable.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: mycenaean_excavations_desc;The secrets of Ancient Greece await!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
national_assimilation_desc;This province is undergoing assimilation to remove the claims that other countries have upon it.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
national_assimilation_acceptance_desc;The minorities in this province have accepted the policies of national assimilation.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
national_assimilation_rejection_desc;The minorities in this province have rejected the policies of national assimilation.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
national_confusion_desc;There has been a great deal of change in our country. It will take some time to sort things out
column2: before business as usual can resume.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: national_instability_desc;The country is in a state of turmoil
column2: and is in danger of rebellions.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: national_recruitment_drive_desc;Our level of potential army recruits has dropped to the point where
column2: if we needed to go to war
column3: we would be in a serious predicament. A national recruitment drive is required to encourage our citizens to join the reserves.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: native_integration_mexico_desc;The time has come to integrate the native cultures of Mexico into the fabric of our country.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
native_integration_peru_desc;The time has come to integrate the Incan native cultures into the fabric of our country.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
native_integration_usca_desc;The time has come to integrate the Mayan native culture into the fabric of our country.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
neutrality_desc;Our country deliberately takes no sides. We do not go to war
column2: even against those the world universally reviles
column3: and thus expect that no one shall go to war against us. This means we will likely never achieve recognition as a 'mover and shaker'
column4: but it also protects us. We shall not abandon our principles for the sake of power and influence.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: after the Reichsdepputationshauptschluss
column3: Napoleon made alliances with the south german states Bavaria
column4: Baden and Württemberg.;;;;;;x

column1: new_capital_in_the_east_title;A New Capital in the East;;;;;;;;;;;;x
new_capital_in_the_east_desc;We will create a new capital for Japan in the city of Edo
column2: giving it a new name and building it into a glorious place that will show the world that Japan is a power to be reckoned with.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: no_freedom_desc;We attempted to free ourselves from foreign rule. We must wait until there is another opportunity
column2: as for now they are watching us closely.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: no_line_of_advantage_desc;Instead of focusing on military might and conquest
column2: Japanese security must be provided by devotion to technological progress and reform. We must match the Western powers
column3: and quickly
column4: or they will surely take advantage and find Japan sorely unprepared.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: no_more_war;No More War;Nous ne Voulons pas la Guerre;Wir Wünschen Nicht Krieg;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
no_more_war_desc;Our people are tired of war. It will be difficult to get their enthusiasm for another anytime soon
column2: so in the meantime our ability to wage war will be very limited. §YNOTE: This means you have very few CB's that you can begin a war with while this modifier lasts!§W;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: no_negotiation_with_pbc_ARG_desc;The Peru-Bolivian dictator refused our generous proposal of dissolution of his 'Confederation of Peru-Bolivia'. Our only alternative
column2: now
column3: is to break the confederation by force.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: no_negotiation_with_pbc_CHL_desc;The Peru-Bolivian dictator refused our generous proposal of dissolution of his 'Confederation of Peru-Bolivia'. Our only alternative
column2: now
column3: is to break the confederation by force.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: north_borneo_company_desc;Rights to trading ports along the northern coast of Borneo have been granted to several companies through treaties-- and have recently fallen to Alfred Dent of London. Through him
column2: we may conduct a new treaty that turns these rights into colonial concessions. Considering that the control of the local sultans over these areas is murky at best
column3: and more than one has sometimes granted rights to the same areas
column4: it truly seems as if we are obtaining clearance for the creation of a British North Borneo Company rather than wresting land from the natives.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: north_korean_reunification_desc;Reunification can only be achieved by force. Led by our glorious leader Kim Il-Sung we shall defeat the evil capitalist traitors to the south and their American overlords!;;;;;;x
nuclear_victim_desc;We have been dealt a cruel fate by a foreign nation. The international community shares our grief.;;;;;;x
nuke_america_cubamissilecrisis_desc;The United States' decision to invade Cuba following the Caribbean crisis has left us no other choice
column2: we must retaliate with all our nuclear might to protect our international integrity!;;;;;;x

column1: occupation_of_araucania_desc;A proposal has been brought forth to finally push into the southern lands of Araucania and pacify them once and for all. Chile must make its claim so none can deny us.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: a Russian enclave North of Poland which used to be part of Germany
column3: its empire and before that Prussia could be sold back to them should we want to.;;;;;;;x

column2: evolving from a simple government of bureaucrats and despots to a true organism of the state. We march into a modern era
column3: one where new ideas will tranform the way we live.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: operation_barbarossa_desc;With our Western front secured we can now turn our attention to our worst enemy with whom we made a necessary pact in August 1939
column2: the bolshevik giant in the East! The goal of Operation Barbarossa is to expand the Greater Reich thousands of miles East and secure valuable resources for the war effort.;;;;;;x

column1: orange_river_convention_desc;The Boers of the Orange Free State are becoming increasingly resistant to colonial rule. The time has come to meet with them at Bloemfontein and discuss the terms of their independence-- preferably subject to our conditions
column2: which are that they abandon all laws allowing slavery and that our influence within their borders remain strong.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: order_to_expel_barbarians_desc;Since the ascension of the Tokugawa Shogun
column2: the role of the Emperor has been confined to that of figurehead. We lead Japan
column3: yet we do not. Recently
column4: the leadership of the Shogun has come into question. His increasing inability to deal with foreigners in a way that shows any manner of leadership compels the Emperor to act-- with or without the Shogun's permission. We shall send out a call to the people in our own name
column5: demanding they rise up and throw out the foreigners that the Shogun will not.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: organize_algeria_desc;We should organize the African colonies to better reflect both a local structure
column2: as well as set up the possibility for autonomous rule-- dominated by our benevolent colonial administrators

column1: organize_angola_desc;Angola is becoming a true colony. We must create the proper structures
column2: so that it stands on par with our other national states.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: organize_botswana_desc;We should organize the African colonies to better reflect both a local structure
column2: as well as set up the possibility for autonomous rule-- dominated by our benevolent colonial administrators
New Caledonia and Vancouver Island must be merged into a single entity-- both for the sake of their viability as well as to ensure their strength in the years to come.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: as well as set up the possibility for autonomous rule-- dominated by our benevolent colonial administrators

column1: ottoman_islamic_rule_desc;The full equality of Islamic millets
column2: and the importance given to traditional Sharia law
column3: will ensure greater peace and adherence to order within Islamic provinces.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: ottomanism_reform_desc;The Hatt-i Hümayun has established religious equality among the Empire's minorities
column2: and gone a long way towards assuaging some of the concerns of nationalists within our borders.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: ottoman_oppression_desc;A number of Ottoman policies regarding Christians within the Empire
column2: such as the Jizya tax and restrictions on work and movement
column3: set the stage for issues in the Balkans for years to come. These policies were not revoked until the Tanzimat Reforms which began in 1839.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: ottomans_to_turks_desc;The Ottoman dynasty is over. The Turkish people must move on as a country united under a common culture.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
otto_von_bismarck_desc;The current Chancellor of our nation
column2: von Bismarck is a remarkable statesman perhaps one of the finest our nation will ever know.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the gauchos;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: our_brothers_the_gauchos_desc;It's time to free our brothers
column2: the Gauchos
column3: from the brazilian rule!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: outside_form_italy_desc;Although our country has a monopoly on Italian affairs
column2: it would perhaps be easier for us to have one strong ally instead of seven or even nine weaker puppets.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: outside_italia_irredenta_desc;Italy's new claims do not conflict with our territorial interests. As a show of good faith
column2: let us hand over any province of ours that lies within their claims.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: overthrow_the_bakufu_desc;The time has come to restore Emperor Meiji to power. For too long has the imperial court been forced to remain but a figurehead
column2: with central authority remaining with the tyrannical Tokugawa clan. Japan must have one ruler
column3: an Emperor that can lead the nation into the future. Let us send our forces to Kyoto
column4: to seize the imperial palace and set the coup in motion.\n\n§RNOTE: To win this war
column5: you must occupy Edo or White Peace with the Shogun. You must not allow Kyoto and your capital to become occupied.§W;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: panama_canal;Panama Canal;Panama Canal;Panama Canal;Panama Canal;Panama Canal;Panama Canal;Panama Canal;Panama Canal;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
panama_canal_dividend_desc;We are currently processing the receipts for ships having passed through the Panama canal.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: panama_canal_treaty_annuity_desc;We are currently processing the payments from the Panama Canal Treaty.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
parade_desc;Let us display our nation's armed forces in the streets. We are a power to be reckoned with
column2: and all the world will know it!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
threatening others and readying us for war?;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x

column1: partmob_desc;We have partially mobilised our reserve armed forces;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x
party_scandal_evidence_desc;Evidence has come to light which has only worsened the national scandal
column2: putting the government at dire risk if it should come to an election.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: passports_desc;The demand on our government's immigration system has been immense. We must come up with new ways to ensure that the rights of our new citizens are protected and recognized by the world.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: we should break free from the southern dominance and show who is the real power in the Andes!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: peace_with_the_emperor_desc;Since the ascension of the Tokugawa Shogun
column2: the Emperor has remained a figurehead. Even so
column3: he is a leader of the Japanese people and
column4: at times
column5: has expressed dissatisfaction with our own position as ruler of Japan. This has caused conflict
column6: and should we reach a point where our positions are not so different-- and
column7: indeed
column8: the Emperor is satisfied with our ability to rule
column9: perhaps we can bring this conflict to an end once and for all.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: pearl_harbor_desc;Our fleet at Pearl Harbor has been attacked by the Empire of Japan!;;;;;;x

column2: the Russian Empire has recognized the Aigun river and the Stanovoy mountains as the natural frontiers between Russia and China. There are many within the government
column3: however
column4: who believe it would be in our best interest to access a southern port upon the Sea of Japan-- namely the Chinese city of HaIshenwai. Considering the Chinese only barely control their northeastern provinces
column5: and this new 'Taiping' government is not one we concluded the treaty with
column6: it seems within our right to approach them for negotiation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: perfect_fusion_desc;Now that liberal forms have been introduced to our nation's government
column2: the people of Sardinia have come to view their separate status as more of a liability than a privilege. Perhaps an act of 'Perfect Union' between the Sardinians and the northern Italians is required to at last bring harmony to our house and aid the eventual reuinification of Italy.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: play_harder_game_desc;This decision allows you to make your game harder by reducing your National Foci by any amount you like. Each time you fire it the National Focus of your country is reduced by 1.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
play_historical_countries_desc;This is a decision that allows you in 1604
column2: 1714 and 1764 scenarios to remove cores of countries that historically were created in the 19th and 20th century.  So no more creation(through crisis or revolution) of ahistorical countries in 1604
column3: 1714 and 1764.  The countries that are removed are : Ukraine
column4: Ruthenia
column5: Romania
column6: Hungary
column7: Greece
column8: Bulgaria
column9: Serbia
column10: Bosnia

column1: plombieres_desc;We should seek french help to kick Austria out of Italy.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
PNJ_embrace_avadhi_minority_desc;The Sikh Empire is a secular
column2: tolerant state. We shall embrace the Avadhi lands under our dominion
column3: and together forge a nation even stronger than before.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: PNJ_embrace_pashtun_minority_desc;The Sikh Empire is a secular
column2: tolerant state. We shall embrace the Pashtun lands under our dominion
column3: and together forge a nation even stronger than before.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: PNJ_embrace_sindi_minority_desc;The Sikh Empire is a secular
column2: tolerant state. We shall embrace the Sindi lands under our dominion
column3: and together forge a nation even stronger than before.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: political_ideology_desc;New ideas have come to our nation
column2: and with them come new doctrines and principles that will change the foundations of how our people live.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: populationsize_30k_desc;Our population has reached thirty thousand people.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
populationsize_100k_desc;Our population has reached one hundred thousand people.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
populationsize_300k_desc;Our population has reached three hundred thousand people.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
populationsize_1M_desc;Our population has reached one million people.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
populationsize_3M_desc;Our population has reached three million people.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
populationsize_10M_desc;Our population has reached ten million people.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
populationsize_30M_desc;Our population has reached thirty million people.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

populationsize_300M_desc;Our population has reached three hundred million people.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
portuguese_civil_code_desc;The Portuguese Civil Code was unique for European civil codes
column2: in its characterization of laws in terms of the person and property; it was divided into four sections: the person
column3: the acquisition of goods
column4: goods
column5: and the defense of those goods or rights.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: power_vacuum_desc;The government is in a state of transition as it struggles to find its new leader or fall in the process.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
propose_danube_federation_desc;A new notion has arisen in our country-- one of extending the rights currently enjoyed by the Hungarians to the other Danubian cultures. We cannot
column2: after all
column3: expect that our nation will be able to peacefully continue on with two cultures dominating so many others. Provided the Hungarians will agree
column4: we could unite our cultures into a larger and more peaceful federation of the Danube.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: protect_eastern_christians_desc;If we are to retain our status as the defenders of eastern Christians
column2: we must act now and make war upon the Turks and her allies. We will not be denied!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: protectorat_wallis_desc;The puppet Helvetic Republic served Napoleon's purposes well for some time until it became ridden with inner strife and disputes and became unstable. The inner crisis in the Helvetic Republic became especially tangible by 1802. At the very same time
column2: Napoleon felt great need to secure the passages to Italy and stabilise connections between France and Italy. Therefore the old idea of Rhodanic Republic became revitalized. This time
column3: Napoleon simply made the whole canton of Valais into the Rhodanic Republic
column4: fully independent of the Helvetic Republic which had still a few months to live. Thus Napoleon's hands were free and he had got a sure method of securing a safe passage into Italy.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: provincia_cisplatina_desc;The Provincia Cisplatina was brazilian once
column2: and shall be brazilian again!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: punitive_effects_desc;Our humiliation at the hands of the victors
column2: and the punitive effects of reparations have taken its toll on our people.  We will be all but unable to wage war unless someone declares war on us first.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: purchase_spanish_pacific_desc;With the Spanish having lost their colonial facilities in Manila
column2: their Pacific holdings are difficult to administrate and incredibly expensive for them. Considering that our government's interests lie in obtaining a foothold in the Pacific
column3: we should perhaps approach them with the notion of purchasing these islands for ourselves.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: purge_desc;The proletarian state has many enemies
column2: ones that do not see the larger plan and how it benefits us all. We must locate them and keep them from harming our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: purge_the_traitors_desc;The proletarian state has many enemies
column2: ones that do not see the larger plan and how it benefits us all. We must locate them and keep them from harming our nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: putiatin_mission_desc;The Japanese islands have only recently begun to communicate with the larger world. Considering the border we share in the Kurils
column2: it might be prudent to send a mission to open up formal diplomatic ties with the Japanese and work out an arrangement to avoid future conflict over the islands.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: raise_the_flag_of_freedom_desc;The time has come to take a stand
column2: to fight against the dominance of the south and in the name of free men everywhere!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
this refers to the body of knowledge developed by Japan through its contacts with the Dutch enclave of Dejima
column3: which allowed Japan to keep abreast of Western technology and medicine in the period when the country was closed to foreigners.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: rangit_singh_desc;The Maharajah Ranjit Singh has united the Panjabi misls under a single flag. He has formed a secular and tolerant state
column2: one that has thrown off the Afghan yoke and resisted the encroaching imperialists. The future of the Sikh Empire is bright!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reach_out_to_Khrushchev_desc;The Cuban Missile Crisis has the potential to open the gates of hell for the whole world
column2: it may be a fool's hope but perhaps reaching out to the Soviets could have positive results?;;;;;;x

column1: reactionary_stronghold_desc;This region is considered a stronghold of reactionary support within the country.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: it's only a matter of time before we discover the rest and stamp them out!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: Receivingaid_DESC;We have recieved aid from Germany;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x
recent_crisis_desc;We have been the instigators in a recent crisis. Until memories fade
column2: the world will likely tend to overlook any further demands we make for our territories.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: recession_desc;The economy is in a recession
column2: leading to a downturn in production and a fear among the population that bad times lay ahead.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reclaim_alsace_lorraine_desc;The neighboring territory of Alsace-Lorraine is inhabited by German people
column2: and rightfully belongs to Germany. We renounced our rightful claim to it
column3: but perhaps the time has come for us to re-assert our claim and liberate the Germans who live there?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reclaim_croatia_desc;The Croatians renounced their ties to Hungary during the revolution
column2: but now the time has come to reclaim our ancient kingdom's western shores.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reclaim_herat_desc;Herat has and always will rightfully belong to Persia. We will retake it!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reclaim_poland_GER_desc;Our lands in Poland were stripped from us unfairly. Now is the time to reclaim those lands in the name of Germany!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reclaim_poland_RUS_desc;Our lands in Poland were stripped from us unfairly. Now is the time to reclaim those lands in the name of Russia!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reclaim_the_UK_desc;We must rise up and reclaim all of the British Isles-- the old Empire will exist once again!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
recognize_cuba_desc;The Cubans have established themselves as a free country
column2: and it falls on the Americans as descendants of the Sons of Liberty to officially recognize their independence and encourage their growth as American allies.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: recognize_phillipines_desc;The Filipinos have established themselves as a free country
column2: and it falls on the Americans as descendants of the Sons of Liberty to officially recognize their independence and encourage their growth as American allies.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: recognize_puerto_rico_desc;The Puerto Ricans have established themselves as a free country
column2: and it falls on the Americans as descendants of the Sons of Liberty to officially recognize their independence and encourage their growth as American allies.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: recognize_the_csa_desc;We will extend formal recognition of the Confederate States of America
column2: opening an embassy in their capital and formally establishing relations. The Yankees will
column3: of course
column4: not approve.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: recognize_the_fsa_desc;We will extend formal recognition of the Free States of America
column2: opening an embassy in their capital and formally establishing relations. The USA will
column3: of course
column4: not approve.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reconcile_with_arabs_desc;Now that the Arab Revolt has been brought to a close
column2: perhaps the time has come to reconcil with our Arabic populace and re-integrate them back into Ottoman society.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reform_CSA_desc;If the North will not stand for truth and justice
column2: then the South shall rise and take its place!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reform_kalmar_desc;Once all of Scandinavia was ruled by a single monarch
column2: our people united in purpose. With our nation on the rise in power and prestige
column3: it is time to resurrect the Kalmar Union once more. For now this is just an idea
column4: and one we must convince the other Scandinavian countries to accept. In time
column5: they will come to see the benefit inherent in our common bond.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reform_the_UK_desc;Now that we have reclaimed the British Isles we must restore them to a single
column2: united rule once more.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reform_the_USCA_desc;The time has come for the Federal Republic to be reformed. Long live Central America!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
reform_the_USCA_outside_desc;We will reform the Federal Republic of Central America
column2: a strong and united ally under our control.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: refuse_line_of_advantage_desc;Instead of focusing on military might and conquest
column2: Japanese security must be provided by devotion to technological progress and reform. We must match the Western powers
column3: and quickly
column4: or they will surely take advantage and find Japan sorely unprepared.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: refute_manifest_destiny_desc;The American claims to our frontier have proven to be little more than empty air and bluster. Those lands belong to Mexico
column2: and no other.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: rejoin_usa_desc;With the American government restored to democracy
column2: our people have decided it is time to rejoin the Union. Let the United States be restored to the destiny it was meant for!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: release_bukovina_desc;With our holdings in Bukovina cut off from the rest of Austria
column2: it only makes sense that we give the locals more autonomy. Let the Romanians raise their own armies-- so long as they do so in the service of the Austrian crown.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: release_dalmatia_desc;With our holdings in Dalmatia cut off from the rest of Austria
column2: it only makes sense that we give the locals more autonomy. Let the Polish raise their own armies-- so long as they do so in the service of the Austrian crown.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: release_galicia_desc;With our holdings in Galicia-Lodomeria cut off from the rest of Austria
column2: it only makes sense that we give the locals more autonomy. Let the Polish raise their own armies-- so long as they do so in the service of the Austrian crown.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: release_gandhi_desc;Releasing Gandhi may calm the Indian masses (as well as soothing our own liberals and socialists) temporarily
column2: without him they are unpredictable. However once released there is no telling where he might lead them.;;;;;;x

column1: release_silesia_desc;With our holdings in Silesia cut off from the rest of Austria
column2: it only makes sense that we give the locals more autonomy. Let the Polish raise their own armies-- so long as they do so in the service of the Austrian crown.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: religiousnutsmod_desc;A religious minority has enforced its demands upon our nation.;;;;;;x;;
rename_uruguay_desc;With Uruguay now under our control
column2: the traditional state of Cisplatina should be re-instated.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: reorganize_angola_desc;Now that we have taken possession of this African colony
column2: we should reorganize its structure to make it truly part of our greater colonial administration.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: repeal_gag_rule_desc;The gag order placed on the House of Representatives is causing too many issues-- the time has come to repeal it
column2: and allow the antislavery petitions to be considered once again.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: republican_reforms_desc;Under a liberal and democratic government
column2: Turkey must be transformed into a modern and secular state!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: republic_of_ireland_desc;Ireland had been a de facto republic since 1936 but only with the Republic of Ireland Act were the last vestiges of the British Empire abolished by law
column2: firmly establishing the Irish President as the official head of state and the Republic of Ireland as the state's official description.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: restone_charlesII_desc;The Cromwells will lead us all to ruin. Let's restore the son of our murdered King
column2: Charles II
column3: to the English throne!;;;;;;x;;

column1: restore_mexican_empire_desc;With the backing of the Second French Empire
column2: a new monarchy may be created in Mexico and place us among the ranks of European powers. Long live Emperor Maximilian I of Mexico!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: restore_richmond_capital_desc;The capital of the FSA rightfully belongs in Richmond
column2: Virginia. Now that it is under our control
column3: we must make the symbolic gesture of restoring it as the center of the Confederacy and proving the strength of the South.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: restore_the_union_desc;Our manifest destiny is to reclaim the United States of America which once was
column2: and thus to re-create it in the name of the Founding Fathers and the true spirit of independence.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: restore_uruguay_desc;The Uruguayans have been liberated from Brazilian control. It is time to restore their independent name.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
restore_washington_capital_desc;The capital of the USA rightfully belongs in Washington
column2: D.C. Now that it is under our control
column3: we must make the symbolic gesture of restoring it as the center of the Union and proving the strength of America.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: return_heligoland_desc;Since the end of WW2 the German island of Heligoland heligoland
column2: occupying a strategic location in the North Sea
column3: has been under Soviet occupation. Now that China is reintegrating itself into socialist
column4: and voices are growing for the port's return
column5: it may be best to return the island to China in order to promote a cooperative future.;;;;;;x

column2: Port Arthur
column3: occupying a strategic location in the Yellow Sea. Now that China is reintegrating itself into a Socialist model
column4: and voices are growing for the port's return
column5: it may be best to return the island to China in order to promote a cooperative future.;;;;;;x

column2: we stand in a position to resume control over South Peru and unite the nation once more.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
we may assume leadership over the government and gain international recognition as the true rulers of China.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
we may assume leadership over the government and gain international recognition as the true rulers of China.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
we may assume leadership over the government and gain international recognition as the true rulers of China.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: revolutionary_society_desc;A revolutionary society has emerged in our country planning to overthrow current government;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: and despite our wishes the United States stands divided. Our only option is to extend official recognition of the south's right to secede. If we cannot live under the same roof
column3: we shall be kind neighbors
column4: and perhaps even brothers in arms. May God help us all.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: rio_da_prata_desc;As the Parana river is the natural southern border of Brazil
column2: it's natural for such a great country to conquer Entre-Rios.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: rio_grande_treaty_desc;Our allies in the Rio Grande should be approached to find their willingness to turn over lands claimed by the state of Texas.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
ruling_party_scandal_desc;A recent scandal has rocked the government and eroded support for the ruling party.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
russian_sakhalin_desc;With the hated Japanese finally driven out of Sakhalin and Russia in full control of the islands
column2: Russian administration and names can at last be restored.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: ryukyu_is_japanese_desc;The islands that were once Ryukyu are rightfully Japanese territory. We must establish our claim to them!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

sand_river_convention_desc;The Boers of the Transvaal are becoming increasingly resistant to colonial rule. The time has come to meet with them at Pretoria and discuss the terms of their independence-- preferably subject to our conditions
column2: which are that they abandon all laws allowing slavery and that our influence within their borders remain strong.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: sarawak_protectorate_desc;The so-called 'White Rajah' dynasty of Sarawak has held close ties with England since its creation
column2: and now the possibility of peacefully establishing a protectorate over this kingdom in the East Indies has arisen.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: SCA_customs_union_desc;The first step in uniting the Scandinavian nations is to eliminate the restrictions on trade between us. Open the borders!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
SCA_political_union_desc;The next step towards uniting Scandinavia is reducing the differences in our governments. Why have multiple agencies when there can simply be one
column2: providing all our people with the services they need? We must surrender our individual sovereignty for common gain.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: second_alaskan_purchase_desc;Interlopers have moved in on our claims in northern Alaska. Considering we have friendly enough relations with them
column2: perhaps we should consider a purchase of the territory before we resort to war?;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: second_declaration_of_independence_desc;As the founding fathers did before us
column2: so shall we stand up for our sovereign rights and not permit the interests of the North override what the South knows to be right and proper in our eyes. We shall be free
column3: and let no free man say otherwise.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: to maintain order in our nation
column3: the police must be given powers that trascend civil liberties.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: self_strengthening_movement_desc;We cannot take a back seat to the western nations. We must make strides towards modernizing
column2: no matter the cost!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: sell_alaska_desc;We have little use for our North American holdings. They are difficult to defend
column2: and would be worth far more to another country than it is to us. While it may take some time to find an interested and appropriate buyer
column3: perhaps we should start the process?;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: send_zimmermann_telegram_desc;Shall we send the a telegram to Mexico asking for their entrance into the Great War?;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x
show_custom_decisions_desc;"This is a toggle button that allows you to reveal again the decisions that were hidden when ""Hide Custom Decisions"" button was selected.";;;;;;;;;;;;x
siamese_border_treaty_desc;Siam includes within its borders a number of conquered peoples: Laotians
column2: Khmer and Vietnamese. A recent incident has brought to light an opportunity for us: demand that Siam release these lands
column3: which we can then incorporate into our Indochina holdings
column4: or face our wrath.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: SIC_neutrality_desc;The french threaten the monarchic order. We must join the 3rd coalition to stop them.;;;;;;x;;
simla_convention_desc;Now that Tibet is a free nation
column2: it might be prudent for our government to step forward and broker an arrangement. Tibet could be a useful ally
column3: and anything that weakens the Chinese government is not an opportunity to pass up.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: socialist_stronghold_desc;This region is considered a stronghold of socialist support within the country.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
desc_social_reform_movement;Socialists and communists have initiated a countrywide agenda for better living conditions.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: determined to either see the United States returned to its democratic tradition or secede their state from the union.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: soviet_afghani_agreements_desc;The Soviet-Afghani Agreements dated back to the Bolshevik Revolution in 1917. The Soviet Union was one of the first countries to establish diplomatic relations with Afghanistan and provided them with military hardware;;;;;;x

soviet_northkorea_landreform_desc;Communist support has grown remarkably amongst the Korean population following years of Japanese occupation. Implementing communist land reforms would transfer control of land from rich owners to poor farmers and finalise the transition to a communist society in Korea.;;;;;;x
spanish_restoration_desc;A period of relative peace and stability in Spain initiated by King Alfonso XII
column2: the aim being to create a new system of government with balance between the liberals and conservatives.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: sprawling_empire_desc;Ours is one of the largest nations in the world
column2: a power to be reckoned with.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: start_EU_process_desc;The last war was a disaster for Europe
column2: if this group of nations is to survive in this ever-changing world it must unite behind a common cause
column3: and possibly
column4: a common flag.;x;;;;;;;;;

column1: start_space_mission_desc;In order to colonise other planets we need the best and brightest our nation has to offer.;;;;;;x
stop_poland_lithuania_desc;The Poland-Lithuanian union is at an end. We must put aside our dreams of greatness and return to our roots as Poland itself.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
stopwar_DESC;We are not ready for war yet;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x
stopwar2_desc;We are not ready for war yet;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x
