column1: suez_canal_treaty_annuity_desc;We are currently processing the payments from the Suez Canal Treaty.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
sulu_protectorate_desc;The Sultanate of Sulu has held close ties with Spain for many years
column2: and now the possibility of peacefully establishing a protectorate over this country in the East Indies has arisen.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: switched_production_desc;The province has just switched its major production
column2: and locals are still acclimatizing to the change.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
and our modern administration will get rid of Gaijin names and change the island accordingly.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: Tampicoaffair_Event;Mexico has threatened some of our soldiers;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x

column2: seven of our soldiers were confronted and detained by the Mexican authorities in Veracruz. Shall we occupy the port city
column3: which is soon recieving an arms shipment from Germany? We currently have an arms embargo on Mexico
column4: right now we support the other side in their civil war.;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x

column2: it is imperative to American safety.;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x
we have no justification.;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x

column1: Tampicoresponse_Event;The United States wants Veracruz;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x
Tampicoresponse_DESC;Our soldiers have reportedly detained American soldiers
column2: and now the United States will occupy Veracruz. We can't really do very much about it
column3: since they have part of their navy there.;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x

column2: but were angry.;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x

column1: tanzimat_era_desc;The Tanzimat era was a period of reform in the Ottoman Empire
column2: characterized by an increasing drive towards westernization and multiculturalism. This was supported by the Young Ottomans
column3: an intellectual class who saw reform as the only way to prevent the ultimate breakup of a decaying power.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: tanzimat_islamic_caliphate_desc;With an orientation of the Empire towards embracing Arab cultures
column2: and a rejection of the liberal ideals of the Tanzimat Reforms
column3: the Empire has put itself on a path of regaining its role as the preeminent Islamic power. Traditionalists are pleased
column4: and we have seen a widespread acceptance of our aim among Arab groups. While European nations will no doubt seek to interfere
column5: we can at least rest easy knowing that nationalism will not find an easy hold in the Islamic Arab world.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: or 'Basic Law'
column3: was a period of constitutional rule in the Empire promoted by the Young Ottomans and intended to serve as a compromise between conservative religious groups and those more interested in reforming the Empire into a modern European democracy.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: tanzimat_western_democracy_desc;With an indication of our alignment towards Europe and a movement away from traditional religious institutions
column2: the Ottoman government has the opportunity to fully enact the ideals of the Young Ottomans and the Tanzimat Reforms. This will endear us towards other European powers and ensure they do not undertake any radical notions of partitioning the Balkans
column3: even if it will ultimately upset more radical Turkish nationalists.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: desc_tax_protests;People are protesting against high taxation.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
desc_tax_riots;Unrest has caused violent riots against our heavy taxation.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

tea_act_desc;The Tea Act will address certain issues regarding tea and other commodities in our American colonies. The proposed taxes and trade restrictions should solve problems which have plagued the Empire's tea trade for many years. Our governors warn however that many colonists will not take the news of new demands from England lightly.;;;;;;x;;
tea_party_desc;Tax after tax we have let the British humiliate these colonies. It's time to take a stand and show the tyrants in London what we freeborn Americans think of their tea act!;;;;;;x;;
Tension_Event;There is much tension in Europe;Besoins satisfaits d'au moins;Erfüllte Bedürfnisse mindestens;;Necesidades satisfechas a;;;;;;;;x;
Tension_DESC;Tension fills the air as Europe is readying for war. Our people are ignited by this war fever
column2: and we now have the ability to call up more of them for military service if the need arises.;Moins de $VAL$ souhaitent une réforme politique.;Weniger als $VAL$ wollen politische Reformen.;;Menos de $VAL$ quieren reformas políticas.;;;;;;;;x;

column1: tension_1;We must be prepared;Au moins $VAL$ souhaitent une réforme politique.;Mindestens $VAL$ wollen politische Reformen.;;Al menos $VAL$ quieren reformas políticas.;;;;;;;;x;

column2: a colony of ours was highly unpopulated until now. Many of our protestant population started to leave the homeland for the brighter future in the border of the newly formed United States of America
column3: hoping for a better life than they had in their birthplace

column1: the_art_of_business_desc;We shall embrace the arts of commerce employed by the greater powers
column2: for it is with the power of coin and the lure of prosperity that we shall achieve true independence.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_art_of_diplomacy_desc;The ways of other nations are not ours
column2: yet if we are to stand on our own we must learn their ways. We must embrace the use of diplomats and treaties
column3: not because their way is superior but because if we are to find our own path we must first learn to play their game.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_art_of_science_desc;It is true that our nation lags behind the scientific prowess of other countries. But all things can change.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_art_of_war_desc;It falls upon our nation to learn the arts of war practiced by the more advanced countries of the world. We must modernize our armed forces
column2: for one day they will learn we are more than their equal. We are their match.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_british_raj_desc;Greatest of the jewels in our nation's crown is the Indian Raj.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_emperor_desc;The coronation of Napoleon as Emperor of the French was the instantiation of a modern empire
column2: approved by the french people.;;;;;;x;;
and bringing with it dangerous new doctines that threaten democratic principle. Whether our nation stands with those who desire freedom
column3: or seeks a different path will be ours to decide and ours alone.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: or the Golden Law
column3: abolished slavery once and for all throughout Brazil. The law contained only two artices; Slavery was to be abolished
column4: and any previous ruling contradicting the first article was now void.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_great_game_bukhara_title;The Great Game Comes to Bukhara;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_great_game_bukhara_desc;We must press our domination of Central Asia. This means that Bukhara must join our nation
column2: or stand forever more subject to British aggression in the region.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_great_game_khiva_title;The Great Game Comes to Khiva;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_great_game_khiva_desc;We must press our domination of Central Asia. This means that Khiva must join our nation
column2: or stand forever more subject to British aggression in the region.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_great_game_kokand_title;The Great Game Comes to Kokand;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_great_game_kokand_desc;We must press our domination of Central Asia. This means that Kokand must join our nation
column2: or stand forever more subject to British aggression in the region.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_great_game_makran_title;The Great Game Comes to Makran;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_great_game_makran_desc;We must press our domination of Central Asia. This means that Makran must be subjugated as a British colony
column2: or we risk losing it to Russian aggression in the region.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_great_game_panjab_title;The Great Game Comes to Panjab;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_great_game_panjab_desc;We must press our domination of Central Asia. This means that the Panjab must be subjugated as a British colony
column2: or we risk losing it to Russian aggression in the region.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_great_game_sindh_title;The Great Game Comes to Sindh;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_great_game_sindh_desc;We must press our domination of Central Asia. This means that the Sindh must be subjugated as a British colony
column2: or we risk losing it to Russian aggression in the region.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_holy_city_desc;Mecca is the center of all Islam. To hold it is to stand above all others
column2: and prove to them that the fate of all Islam lies in our hands.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_hungarian_revolution_desc;We must call upon all Hungarians to rise up and throw off Hapsburg rule forever. For Hungary!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_ikhwan_desc;An alliance has been made with the Bedouin Wahhabists. Islam shall remain pure in our nation
column2: in exchange for their military support.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_means_of_production_desc;We have the means at our hands to be a nation of power and significance. We must exert that power responsibly
column2: for now we are a true citizen of the world.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_new_army_desc;We must advance our nation's army into a modern fighting force
column2: the equal of any in the west!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_new_pbc_desc;Now we are a greater power
column2: we can unite again with our South-Andean brothers and sisters.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_open_door_desc;The 'Open Door' immigration policy meant that racial and cultural barriers to immigration were lifted
column2: and began a wave of immigration in the New World that was previously unprecedented.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_peoples_republic_desc;For too long have the people been oppressed by the capitalist overlords. It is time for the proletariat to take their first bold steps toward communism. The socialists have gained enough support in the upper house to begin change
column2: and with the working class behind them
column3: the transition to a Socialist Republic should be swift. It is time for the proletariat to meet their destiny.;;;;;;x;;

column1: the_rights_of_man_desc;A recognition has begun among our people of the basic fundamental rights that all humanity shares. This is the first step in becoming a truly modern civilization.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_west_french_land_exchange_desc;With the war over we no longer need to keep control of the western coast of France. The Vichy have made several petitions for it
column2: though we would like something in return. We can demand the Vichy give their northern provinces in exchange for the coast
column3: allowing us to set up future states in France in the future.;;;;;;x

column1: tonghak_reforms_desc; The peasant class of Korea has suffered as of late under the corrupt officials of the current system. Currently the floods and famines that have taken its toll on the lands has hit them quite hard
column2: with increased taxes current aristocrats and officials have put in place has brought the peasant classes to the point of revolution. In response to this
column3: the government has instituted a number of social
column4: economic and military reforms in order to placate the peasantry. May Korea have some peace for now.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: total_war_in_kashgaria_desc;The glorious revolution awaits. We must call upon all our citizens to fight
column2: lest our cause die before it has even achieved the first step towards victory.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: total_war_in_peking_desc;The Taiping Rebellion threatens the dynasty and
column2: indeed
column3: the entire Empire. We must call on all our citizens to rise up and fight against these Christian infidels!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: total_war_in_rio_grande_desc;The glorious revolution awaits. We must call upon all our citizens to fight
column2: lest our cause die before it has even achieved the first step towards victory.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: total_war_in_rio_grande_sul_title;Total War in Rio Grande do Sul;;;;;;;;;;;;x
total_war_in_rio_grande_sul_desc;The glorious revolution awaits. We must call upon all our citizens to fight
column2: lest our cause die before it has even achieved the first step towards victory.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: total_war_in_satsuma_desc;The rebellion for all that is honorable and traditional in Japan is now upon us. We must call upon all our citizens to fight
column2: lest our cause die before it has even achieved the first step towards victory.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: total_war_in_taiping_desc;The glorious revolution awaits. We must call upon all our citizens to fight
column2: lest our cause die before it has even achieved the first step towards victory.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: total_war_in_yucatan_desc;The glorious revolution awaits. We must call upon all our citizens to fight
column2: lest our cause die before it has even achieved the first step towards victory.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: total_war_in_yunnan_desc;The glorious revolution awaits. We must call upon all our citizens to fight
column2: lest our cause die before it has even achieved the first step towards victory.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: tour_desc; The rulers of the nation have started to charter tour train rides over the country. It is having a positive effect upon the population of our Great Nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: after whom this act is named
column3: has devised a cunning plan to address both economic and political difficulties we have encountered in our dealings with our American colonies recently through the use of new colonial authorities and taxes.;;;;;;x;;

column1: treaties_of_velasco_desc;The treaties may be worth less than the paper they're printed on
column2: but they supposedly offer us a guarantee of independence from Mexico. We shall see if they last.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_aigun_desc;The time has come to approach the Chinese
column2: and make our demand that they turn over northern Manchuria to us. It is the only way there will be peace.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: Treaty_of_Alliance_title;Treaty of Alliance;Treaty of Alliance;Treaty of Alliance;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
Treaty_of_Alliance_desc;According to the treaty both states agreed not to enter in an alliance against the other state
column2: to follow policy of friendship and to help each other. According to Annex 2 Germany guaranteed "with all its efforts the political independence and the territorial integrity of Bulgaria... against every attack or claim from any country." Bulgaria agreed to help Germany with its whole army in case "Germany is attacked without reason by a country bordering with Bulgaria." The Treaty also set the boundaries for Bulgaria and Austria-Hungary after the partition of SerbiaAccording to the treaty both states agreed not to enter in an alliance against the other state
column3: to follow policy of friendship and to help each other. According to Annex 2 Germany guaranteed "with all its efforts the political independence and the territorial integrity of Bulgaria... against every attack or claim from any country." Bulgaria agreed to help Germany with its whole army in case "Germany is attacked without reason by a country bordering with Bulgaria." The Treaty also set the boundaries for Bulgaria and Austria-Hungary after the partition of Serbia.;According to the treaty both states agreed not to enter in an alliance against the other state
column4: to follow policy of friendship and to help each other. According to Annex 2 Germany guaranteed "with all its efforts the political independence and the territorial integrity of Bulgaria... against every attack or claim from any country." Bulgaria agreed to help Germany with its whole army in case "Germany is attacked without reason by a country bordering with Bulgaria." The Treaty also set the boundaries for Bulgaria and Austria-Hungary after the partition of Serbia.;;;;;;;;;;;;x;;;;;;;;;;;;;;

column1: treaty_of_guadalupe_hidalgo_desc;Should we get a convincing enough victory over the Mexicans
column2: we will be able to force them to the negotiating table in order to discuss their surrendering of all claims to land north of the Rio Grande-- in exchange for a fair price

column1: treaty_of_heligoland_desc;Germany is eager to obtain the island of Heligoland
column2: currently in our possession. To avoid a war
column3: it might be in our best interest to arrange a trade: Heligoland in exchange for one of their colonies.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_la_paz_desc;Our claim to both Peru and Bolivia is now considered legitimate.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
treaty_of_nanking_desc;Using our new influence with the Chinese government
column2: we can force them to the table and extract trade and territory concessions-- not the least of which will be the cession of Hong Kong
column3: a valuable port to possess on the southern seas.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: we can take the Turks to the negotiating table and force them to hand over the remainder of Libya in exchange for any other provinces of theirs we hold.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_paris_1856_desc;With the Russians having failed to assert their authority over the Turks
column2: it is time for the powers of Europe to convene in Paris and settle the matter as best we can.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_paris_1898_desc;Spain has no choice but to admit it cannot hold onto its Caribbean and Pacific holdings. If we sit down and enter into peace negotiations with the Spanish government
column2: it is possible they might be willing to end this war and turn over their holdings to us for a price. Some will see this as the beginnings of American colonialism
column3: but to our government this is simply a recognition of the world power that the United States has become.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_paris_russia_desc;Now that we have successfully asserted our authority over the Turks
column2: it is time to convene the powers of Europe in Paris and settle the matter as best we can.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_paris_1898_victory_desc;We have been victorious in our war against Spain
column2: and Cuba is now free. The Spanish government should realize it does not have the power to hold onto its North American and Pacific colonies. We should approach them and demand they turn over these colonies to us-- for
column3: while it might indicate to some the beginnings of American colonialism
column4: we feel these colonies are best entrusted to the care of a democratic Western power who has the power to hold them.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: we are in a position to gain advantage-- namely the island of Formosa and reparations
column3: not to mention proving our own superiority in the conflict.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_simulambuko_desc;With the colonial powers of Europe having met at the Congo Conference to decide the orderly division of the African continent
column2: pressure is mounting for Portugal to occupy the lands we have lain claim to. Our diplomats have been in close contact with the princes of Cabinda
column3: and with additional urging we should be able to conclude a treaty forcing the Kongolese to surrender our Angolan claims.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_saint_petersburg_desc;With the Muslim rebellion in China now over
column2: we find ourselves in a situation where Russia controls the western half of the Dungan basin and China the eastern half. We should force our claim to the entire area.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_tartu_desc;Now that we are free from Russian rule
column2: we should approach the Russian government and discuss the claims to Petsamo and southern Karelia before we end up in a territorial war we cannot hope to win.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_umtata_desc;Now that the war with the Xhosa is done
column2: the time has come to discuss our mutual borders. With our colonists increasingly moving eastward
column3: we may need to incorporate some of their lands into the Cape Colony.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: treaty_of_vereeniging_desc;The Cape Colony is under our control. Now is the time to sit down with our former colonial masters and work out a peace deal that will see it transferred back into Boer hands.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
trucial_protectorate_desc;With enough influence among the sheiks of the Trucial States
column2: a treaty could be signed that would force them to acknowledge us as their sovereign. They would enter into no relationships with other nations without our express permission
column3: and our continued influence over the Arabian peninsula would be secured.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: try_annex_belize_desc;We can annex Belize from England;;;;;;x;;
try_annex_eng_antiles_desc;We can annex the English Antiles;;;;;;x;;
ulster_plantation_desc;England has used plantations in Ireland before but with little success. This time
column2: we shall gradually confiscate Irish lands and give them to proper Protestant Englishmen in an effort to pacify and assimilate the country.;;;;;;x;;

column1: ulster_plantation_mod_desc;England is actively seeking to replace the Irish Catholic population in Ulster with Protestants from Great Britain.;;;;;;x;;

ultimatum_to_portugal_desc;It is in the British government's best interests to expand our colonies in southern Africa northwards. This will be impossible if the Portuguese complete their dreams of the 'Pink Map' by connecting Angola and Mozambique. We must make our demand or face the possibility of surrendering central Africa to other powers.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unequal_treaty_DAI_desc;The Vietnamese are in dire straits. They cannot hold out for much longer. Perhaps we should offer them the chance to go to the negotiating table
column2: and end this war between us on terms very much in our own favor

column1: unequal_treaty_desc;The Qing Empire is at a disadvantage. We are in a position to bring them to the negotiating table
column2: and wrangle concessions of both land and reparations-- provided they are willing

column1: unequal_treaty_TPG_desc;The Heavenly Kingdom is at a disadvantage. We are in a position to bring them to the negotiating table
column2: and wrangle concessions of both land and reparations-- provided they are willing

column1: unequal_treaty_desc;The Japanese are at a disadvantage. We are in a position to bring them to the negotiating table
column2: and wrangle concessions of both trading privileges and reparations-- provided they are willing

column1: unethical_human_experiment_desc;Using people across the nation as test subjects could boost our research potential
column2: however it is unlikely to go down well with the populace and the international community.;x;;;;;;;;;

column1: unite_ethiopia_ETH_desc;The civil war is over. Ethiopia must be one nation!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_ethiopia_SHW_desc;The civil war is over. Shewa must be one nation!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_gran_colombia_desc;Gran Colombia shall be reborn from the ashes. Long live the united republic!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_indonesia_desc;We must unite all of the Malay
column2: Javan
column3: Moluccan and Melanesian people of the East Indies under a common banner. Down with the imperialists!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_la_plata_desc;The nations which were once part of the Viceroyalty of La Plata must be reunited under a single flag once again
column2: the platinean peoples bound together into a great nation
column3: a power to rule in the New World.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_malaya_desc;We must unite all of the Malay peoples of the East Indies under a common banner. Down with the imperialists!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_moldavia_wallachia_desc;The Principalities of Moldavia and Wallachia must unite under a single flag
column2: and together achieve our destiny as a united Romania!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_somalia_desc;We must unite all Somalis under a single
column2: unified flag!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_the_daimyos_desc;With the daimyos under our complete dominance
column2: we will be in a position to fully bring them under the government's control. The divisions maintained by the han system weaken us as a whole-- the Shogunate must be strong and united if it is to move forward as a world power.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the Turkmen
column3: Kyrgyz
column4: Tajiks and Uzbeks can at last be united into a single Turkestan. Should this dream ever come to pass
column5: the world shall tremble before our might!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_with_croatia_desc;Now that Croatia has been formed
column2: the time has come for us to join the motherland.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_with_estonia_desc;The Estonian people have a historic bond with Scandinavian culture. Perhaps it is time that we extend a hand to them
column2: and invite them to join our nation-- at the very least
column3: we could protect them against Russian adventurism.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_with_greece_desc;Our proper place lies with Greece. Long live the Hellenic destiny!;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_with_japan_desc;The time has come to reconcile with the Japanese government
column2: and unite our nations for the good of the Japanese destiny.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_with_moldavia_desc;The Romanian peoples must stand together as one nation
column2: now and forever more. Together we shall forge a new destiny and reclaim the lands that have been taken from us over the centuries.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_with_nepal_desc;The time has come to rejoin with Greater Nepal and reform the great eastern kingdom.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
unite_with_poland_desc;Now that Poland has been reborn
column2: the time has come for Krakow to rejoin the motherland.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_with_romania_desc;Now that Romania has been formed
column2: the time has come for us to join the motherland.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_with_tuscany_desc;For the good of Italian reunification
column2: the time has come for Lucca to unite with our Tuscan neighbours to the south.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_with_ukraine_desc;For the common good of our people
column2: we must set aside our sovereignty and join the greater Ukrainian nation.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: unite_with_yugoslavia_desc;A greater Slavic union is our only hope for security and prosperity. Our leaders urge us to consider a union with Yugoslavia
column2: with whom we hold far more things in common than we do differences.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: usa_southkorea_decision_desc;In order to check the spread of communism in the Korean peninsula it may be necessary to transform our military government there into a pro-capitalist nation. This 'South Korea'
column2: would serve as the antithesis of the Soviet communist North.;;;;;;x

column1: usurp_kalmar_title;Take Leadership in the Kalmar Union;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
usurp_kalmar_desc;While the Kalmar Union was not reborn in our nation
column2: it seems that a united Scandinavia will never come to pass unless a stronger country stands up and takes over the leadership role.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: valparaiso_harbor_desc;Valparaiso has became a required stopover for ships crossing between the Atlantic and Pacific oceans. In its role as a major seaport
column2: Valparaiso receives immigrants from many European countries
column3: but this could change if a new route was to open.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: vassal_rebellion_desc;We have attempted diplomatic efforts to achieve our freedom
column2: and been refused. Now our only hope is to demand our independence on threat of all-out war.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: Veracruzback_Event;We must give Veracruz back.;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x

column2: we dont want to be disliked by the world
column3: and it really was a mistake to take it
column4: so here you go
column5: Mexico
column6: we will be watching your civil war closely
column7: and dont get too close with Germany.;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x

column2: if we have to.;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x
after much negotiation and mediation by Argentina
column3: Brazil
column4: and Chile
column5: have decided to return Veracruz to us.;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x

column1: violate_neutrality_desc;The Swiss may have declared themselves 'neutral'
column2: but if they believe that will stop us-- if they believe the opinion of any of their allies will stop us-- then they are sorely mistaken.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: desc_violent_elections;The current elections turned out have a quite violent undertone in the ongoing campaigns.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x
virginia_company_title;Grant Charter to the Virginia Company;;;;;;x;;

virginia_company_desc;Many illustrious Englishmen are favourable to the idea of building colonies in the Americas in order to gain wealth. By granting charters to the Virginia companies of London and Plymouth we would permit them to build settlements in our name in these strange new lands.;;;;;;x;;
vive_le_quebec_desc;Quebec is free! Finally the Quebecois has the right to govern themselves
column2: and seek out their destiny as an emerging power not only in North America but in the world!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: war_of_the_fours_coalition_desc;The Fourth Coalition against Napoleon's French Empire was defeated in a war spanning 18061807. Coalition partners included Prussia
column2: Russia
column3: Saxony
column4: Sweden
column5: and Great Britain.Many members of the coalition had previously been fighting France as part of the Third Coalition
column6: and there was no intervening period of general peace. In 1806
column7: Prussia joined a renewed coalition
column8: fearing the rise in French power after the defeat of Austria and establishment of the French-sponsored Confederation of the Rhine. Prussia and Russia mobilized for a fresh campaign
column9: and Prussian troops massed in Saxony.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: war_of_the_third_coalition_desc;The War of the Third Coalition was a European conflict spanning the years 1803 to 1806. During the war France and its client states under Napoleon I defeated an alliance of the Holy Roman Empire led by Austria
column2: Russia
column3: and others.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: war_italian_independence_desc;It falls upon our nation to break the power that Austria has over Italy. Lombardia must be freed
column2: at any cost.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: warsawpact_desc;The Warsaw Pact was a collective defense treaty among eight communist states of Central and Eastern Europe in existence during the Cold War. The Warsaw Pact was in part a Soviet military reaction to the integration of West Germany into NATO in 1955 per the Paris Pacts of 1954;;;;;;x

column2: it is time to reassert our Italian heritage. We must rejoin the motherland!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: whistlestop_tour_desc;With the advent of railways in our nation
column2: the idea has been suggested that our monarch tour the nation
column3: traveling from city to city by train. Some urge caution
column4: however
column5: for such public appearances could provide assassins with the opportunity to strike in provinces that are simmering with rebellion.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: or the 'Will of the People'
column3: may the Workers of the World Unite in Proletariat Revolution!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: workshop_of_the_world_desc;Our nation lies at the heart of the Industrial Revolution. Nowhere else is the growth of industry more prevalent and had more impact.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
wrv_desc;The German people united in its tribes and inspired with the will to renew and strengthen the Reich in liberty and justice
column2: to serve internal and external tranquility
column3: and to promote social progress
column4: has adopted this Constitution.;;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column2: it's time for us to assert Italian superiority and become the rulers of Greece!;;;;;;x

column1: WWONE_NAME;World War One;Disposent d'un score militaire inférieur à:;Erringen Sie eine geringere Militärpunktzahl als:;;Tiene una puntuación militar menor que:;;;;;;;;x;
WWONE_DESC;The World is on the brink of war. Europe is set in two alliaces
column2: the Central Powers of Austria-Hungary and Germany
column3: and the Triple Entente of Great Britain
column4: France
column5: and Russia. In the Americas
column6: Mexico is in turmoil. The USA is a power on the rise
column7: with a strong leader in Woodrow Wilson
column8: and a booming economy. In Asia
column9: Japan is another rising power
column10: seeking to impose its rule and increase its colonial holdings across Asia. Russia is the bear of Europe
column11: but has recently been subject to a rebellion brought on by a disasterous war with Japan. They are still a threat to be reckoned with though
column12: as their army is one of the largest
column13: which makes up for its technological and tactical backwardness. Germany is the finest war machine on the planet
column14: but is being dragged down by a fading power
column16: an area full of racial unrest and tension
column17: have almost driven Europe to war in recent years
column18: and may well be the spark that ignites the fire looming on the dawn.;Besoins satisfaits à moins de;Erfüllte Bedürfnisse weniger als;;Necesidades satisfechas a menos de;;;;;;;;x;

column1: You_are_no_parliament!_desc; The military has taken control in the recent election and have abolished the parliament in which they control. As such
column2: the state is fully under the control of the military.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: zanzibar_sale_desc;The Zanzibar coast is almost worthless to us
column2: but might be of value to the neighbouring colonial administration in Tanganyika. We should consider selling it for a tidy profit.;;;;;;;;;;;;;;x;

column1: Zimmermannaccepted_Event;Mexico has accepted our proposal!;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x
Zimmermannaccepted_DESC;Mexico has accepted our proposal concerning war against the United States
column2: and will now declare war on the United States
column3: calling us in. We shall provide them with supplies and monetary aid to help them in their fight.;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x

column1: Zimmermanndeclined_DESC;Mexico has declined our offer to attack the United States. We shall have to fight on our own them.;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x
Zimmermanndeliberated_Event;Shall we accept Germany's offer?;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x
Zimmermanndeliberated_DESC;Would declaring war on the United States to reclaim territory be a good idea?;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x

column2: we shall reclaim our rightful land.;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x
the US is too powerful.;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x

column1: Zimmermanndiscovered_DESC;Germany has sent a telegram to the Mexican Government about them joining the war and attacking the United States. If we reveal this to the US
column2: it will enrage them
column3: bringing them closer to joining the war on our side.;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x

column1: Zimmermanndiscovered_1;More of our troops are dying each day
column2: we need all the help we can get.;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x

column1: Zimmermanndiscovered_2;We shant have those rebellious American scoundrels ruining our fun killing the huns
column2: shall we?;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x

column1: Zimmermannrecieved_Event;Germany has sent a telegram to us;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x

Zimmermannrecieved_DESC;FROM 2nd from London # 5747. "We intend to begin unrestricted submarine warfare. We shall endeavor in spite of this to keep the United States of America neutral. In the event of this not succeeding
column2: we make Mexico a proposal of alliance on the following basis: make war together
column3: make peace together
column4: generous financial support and an understanding on our part that Mexico is to reconquer the lost territory in Texas
column5: New Mexico
column6: and Arizona. The settlement in detail is left to you. You will inform the President of the above most secretly as soon as the outbreak of war with the United States of America is certain and add the suggestion that he should
column7: on his own initiative
column8: invite Japan to immediate adherence and at the same time mediate between Japan and ourselves. Please call the President's attention to the fact that the ruthless employment of our submarines now offers the prospect of compelling England in a few months to make peace." Signed
column9: ZIMMERMANN;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x

column2: we shall have to deliberate about this.;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x

column1: Zimmermannreleased_Event;The UK has released the Zimmermann telegram.;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x
Zimmermannreleased_DESC;Germany has sent a telegram to Mexico asking them to join the war and declare war on us.;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x

column2: thats terrible!;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x

column1: zimmermann_telegram_DESC;The Zimmermann Telegram was a telegram from Germany to Mexico. It was a proposal to join the war for Mexico
column2: and the promise that it would get its former land back in the west. The Foreign Secretary of the German Empire
column3: Arthur Zimmermann
column4: sent it to the German ambassador in Washington DC. It was intercepted by British cryptographers. ;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x

column1: Zimmermanntelegram_Event;Shall we send a telegram to Mexico?;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x
Zimmermanntelegram_DESC;Would it be a good idea to send a telegram to Mexico asking them to join the war? This offer is for them to attack the USA
column2: and in return get their historical territory back. We would provide them with arms and monetary aid
column3: neither of which we can truly supply. We shall soon begin unrestricted submarine warfare
column4: incresing the potential for the US to join the war. Also
column5: the telegram has to go through British telegraph cables
column6: since they cut our transatlantic ones.;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x

column1: Zimmermanntelegram_2;We dont need their help.;États-Unis;USA;;EE UU;;;;;;;;;x
